Reviews.Title: RUN FOR YOUR LIVES!! DO NOT ATTEMPT TO PURCHASE OR USE THIS PRODUCT

Trust me, I am not a picky person, I just like something functional but this not only will NOT connect to my wireless router but there is NO support whatsoever so basically I'm screwed. I sent a message to the seller and got some crazy response that made no sense whatsoever. There is no website, help desk, NOTHING. Unbelievable. I will fight through Visa and BBB to get a full refund but trust it will be a battle.UPDATE # 2: AFTER LESS THAN 1 WEEK, THE TABLET WOULD NOT CHARGE. THIS SELLER'S RETURN POLICY INDICATES THAT DEFECTIVE PRODUCTS ARE NOT THEIR FAULT AND BUYERS MUST PAY RETURN SHIPPING TO CHINA. DO NOT PURCHASE FROM THIS SELLER, YOU HAVE NO RECOURSE!!!!!!!!!!

My opinion I would not buy these for my self as an adult, but for a child as a starter it exactly what I wanted for them. It does have the play store which is the most important thing for easy set up and downloading of applications.

Reviews.Title: Could be better, but best under $150 I'd say
Reviews.Author: Marisa Wolfe
Reviews.Content: I'm a 24 / m that has been rooting and ROMing phones for years so I know my way around android. I am also broke and needed a budget tablet.Pros:----------(EDIT)After tweaking everything a few times, I have found the best performance with these settings.- No frills CPU set to 48mhz lowest, 1.1ghz - 1.2ghz (any higher freezes often with no noticable speed increase)- Use Interactive governor (fast cpu scaling, quick to rev up and kills it when screen off to save battery)use- Use DEADLINE  I/O  (best for multi tasking, least crashes)With these settings and FAST REBOOT and task killer (do not set to auto-clean, just use the task killer widget and fast reboot to clean up ram when you pick it up) I have greatly improved performance.I also ran through many launchers and found Nova to be the best with least lag.-------Original ReviewDecent camera - 1.3mp is better than you think, and it doesn't only work with skype so ignore that reviewScreen was pretty clear. Not HD, but its not the poor low quality I was expecting. Looks fineComes rooted (but there aren't any roms I would recommend. Just use a CPU app and titanium backup / other root apps).Nice design. I was pleaseantly impressed. Pretty thin and lightRuns ICS with PLAY STORE - not all of these a13 allwinner tablets run off the real play store.USB host. Just plug whatever you want into it. It has worked fine with a keyboard and a mouse (yes, a pointer appears on the screen). I will be trying it with a USB hub and see if it will run a mouse and keyboard togetherUSB cannot be used to charge. It is HORRIBLY slow, and not reccomended. BUT, if you are in a pinch, a usb charger will let it stay on. So as long as you have a phone charger, you can at least turn it on.Good quality, but only for the price. If you want a tablet that runs like a thunderbolt or higher quality phone, go to the $150 - $200 range and grab a dual-coreCons:CPU! - Although these are all advertised as 1.2 - 1.5GHZ, they are not. Yes, the software will allow setCPU (or others) to set it to 1.5GHZ, but this is just overclocking a 1GHZ CPU. Which is why people are getting horrible battery life and freezing. Just set it to 1GHZ. its not really slower, because any higher than 1.2 freezes up and crashes.wifi speed isnt the fastest. all around, its about as fast as a 3rd gen ipod touch for web. Just about every phone I have had has been faster.Screen - My biggest complaint is the screen. quality was good, but the viewing angle is horrible. you have to hold it just right to avoid bad contrast. ESPECIALLY portrait viewing. You cannot look straight at it in portrait. And the screen is about 5% hidden underneath the black edges of the screen.Battery - I have only had it one day, but the battery life seems to be 3-5 hrs if you barely use it. I dont care to keep mine on the charger a lot. otherwise its about 2-3 hrs if you are lucky.(EDIT) After having it for a full 24 hours I have run a battery test from 100%. Battery has lasted almost 13 hours through the night. Up time was about 5 hours. down time (idle or in airplane mode) was 8. So if you set it down in airplane mode, it will do A LOT better.Laggy - music was skipping a little, if you dont constantly close apps, it will get pretty slow. And if you are downloading / installing an app, it can really ONLY do that. everything else slows up til its done. But again, its a budget tablet. And still does better than others in the price range (EDIT: after changing the cpu settings I posted at the top, lagging has almost disappeared. especially if I keep ram clean.Sound - you're gonna need speakers or headphones to watch anything if there is any noise around. pretty quiet. (EDIT: sound can be improved by downloading speaker boost. dont boost more than 40% or you might blow the speaker.)All in all, I like it enough to keep it. Its not great, but I just use it to browse the web and netflix and a few other apps. Nothing major. If you don't have $150 to buy a tablet, this is for you. Just remember its a budget tablet. If you really want a Nexus tablet, save and get it.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy
Reviews.Author: Tianna Morgan
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these tablets for my children after reading the reviews and there being so many 5 stars. Let me start by saying I was weary on this tablets as soon as I opened them because the screens were already scratched up like they had been used we though it may have been from the manufacturing of them. First tablet came on great, downloaded apps netflix worked which was one of the 2 most important apps for them.However the second game the kids want so they can play with us will not allow an account to be created because the google location services cannot locate it for some reason. Also when attempting to log into an account already made for that game it says there is already an account linked to the tablet even though we factory reset it multiple times.Second tablet came on great. However the touchscreen is constantly having issues. I could see it showing as if it was being touched somewhere, no where near where we were actually touching. This was leading to frustration and getting no response from the tablet without hitting power button putting it to sleep then waking it up again only to have it do the same thing 3 minutes later. Attempted to use the stylus it comes with and same result no response half the time without putting to sleep first.Third tablet....This tablet would not even turn on at all.This is an aggravation, this is the 3rd tablets we have tried since Christmas and the kids still do not have their christmas presents. Last year we had really good luck getting a tablet that runs exactly what we want for around this same price however now we can't seem to find anything and we can't afford $400-500 tablets for our children to use.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad for my grandkids
Reviews.Author: Judy Wilson
Reviews.Content: I want to say 'Thank you' to Amazon, for their on time delivery.  I ordered this product back in December for my grand-kids and it never arrived.  I was very skeptical about reordering again on Amazon.com.  But this time I re-ordered through Amazon directly and received my goods without any problems.  I knew their was a reason why I had to have the Zeepad for my grand children.  This tablet is brilliant.  It has more features on it then my Sumsung Tab 10.  The Zeepad also came with a screen protector, and a  pen.  It took less than an hour to charge.  I am thinking of getting one for myself. My grand-kids are in love with their new tablet.

Reviews.Title: Looking for Awesomeness?

I wasn't expecting this mini-tab to outperform the more technologically-infused tablets, and it doesn't.  However, it definitely exceeded my expectations for a Tab in this price point.  I purchased it for my mother, who basically uses it for games like Angry Birds, Solitaire, etc., as well as email and web-surfing.  She loves it!I actually purchased another mini-tab prior to the Zeepad by another brand ... and returned it immediately, so I'm able to give a little bit of a comparison review.  The hardware, software and battery life of the Zeepad, far outweighs the other Tab.  I strongly recommend this Zeepad if you're looking for a mid-to-low market product that's awesome!

Reviews.Title: My 11 year old daughter loves it
Reviews.Author: Michael Cohen "twcable"
Reviews.Content: Admittedly I'd never use this. Not up to my geek standards and feels cheap, but the bottom line on this is that my 11 year old daughter has no standards and uses it for Netflix, Skype, Angry Birds and to surf the internet. She had been living with an iPod Touch 4th gen which got ruined when the charging pins moved, and yet she's still happy with this. This is probably due to the larger, mostly responsive screen size. I downgraded the stars because the micro usb port was DOA. I wouldn't even have noticed except my son bought a keyboard case for her which plugs into the port. On the upside, Amazon gave a full refund (I've had mixed experience on this, but this was clearly a manufacturing issue). In order to prevent the volley back and forth with Amazon if the next one had problems, I bought it again locally.For a child, this is the only tablet to buy.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy at a reasonable price
Reviews.Author: Lilian C
Reviews.Content: We ordered two of these for the kids. They both work fine. Download of Apps is easy and the apps it comes with are very cool and all work.Reviews mentioned batery issues, some things we noticed and settings we changed that helped extend the battery run time considerably are as follows: When you first get the Zeepad the instructions say to charge them for six hours before the first use. Make sure and do that but when you connect the charger the plug that goes into the tablet will not go all the way in until the plug dissapears into the charger input so don't try to force it all the way in. When it "clicks" it's in as far as it can go. There will be a little of the silver part of the plug still visible that does not go into the tablet charger port. If you force it you might damage the unit.  After the first charge the instructions say charge for only 4hours. Do not overcharge and it would be good to set a timer so that you don't over charge the battery. The battery it comes with can be charged and discharged over 2 thousand times but it does not like to be over charged. Also don't not store the unit with a 100% charge for long periods of time, these new batteries like to be stored with 50-40% power only. If they are left to sit for a long time with 100% charge it can damage the structure of the batteries.  Rune time: The main killer of the battery run time is,  the screen brightness. Lower it as the screen is super bright and at only 7 inches they cannot build it with a very large battery. Leaving the screen on the super bright setting eats the batteries pretty quickly. The next big juice hog is the wifi. If yu are not going to be downloading apps, surfing or sending e-mails turn on airplane mode which turns off wiifi. Leaving the wifi on all the time keeps the table searching for the wifi signal and commnicating back and forth with the source and that eats the battery. Once you set it up and are using game apps ( what most kids do ) you dont need the wifi for them while they play apps anyway. If you do these two things the battery should last a bit over 2-2-1/2 hours on a 4 hour charge. Not bad. I wont get into the tech aspects as others have covered that pretty well in other reviews but considering these cost a lot less than other brands the main thing I was concerned with was, if it actually did what they were supposed to do. They both have worked fine and side by side to a samsung galaxy they donwloaded apps at just about the same speed as any other andriod tablet or i phone. The build quality is pretty good considrng the price. If you are looking for some "special ops" military grade hardware this is not the unit for you but if you need something to use daily under normal conditions these are pretty nice. The tablets are impressive and are worth the money. They come from overseas so shipping is not super fast. If you need them for a birthday order with plenty of time to give them a chance to ship from the factory.  If something goes wrong I will update this review but so far, these little tablets has been a very good purchase and the kids love them. Hope this info helps, The battery is not an issue but I addressed that more as most of the negative reviews had to do with them and that was the main thing I worried about when I ordered them. Happy to say the batteries have not been an issue so far. Very nice, congratulations to the company that makes them it looks like you have a nice product here that delivers a good product at a very good price !

Reviews.Title: smile turned upside down

Reviews.Content: I purchased 3 of these for my kids. Despite most of the negative comments about it not lasting long and the chargers not working properly and it freezes. My kids love it. Reviews.Title: Great Tablet

Reviews.Title: FIND ANOTHER TABLET
Reviews.Author: skypilot39b
Reviews.Content: EDIT I dropped the review on this to one star from three.  I purchased two of these tablets for my kids (12 & 9) one died fairly quickly, the story of how the company was willing to deal with that is below.  When I ran anti-virus software on the second one (AVG) I found that the device came to me rooted which tells me the version of Android firmware that is on it is highly suspect and likely counterfeit--that would explain why the tablets don't update with Android updates when my other Android products do.FIND ANOTHER TABLET!The tablet itself seems to work well, what was a problem was when we received it the only charger that came for the tablet was designed for Eastern European plugs, there was an adapter but by the time you got them plugged together the stack was nearly 3 inches from the wall and weighed so much that it wouldn't stay plugged in.  There was also a micro USB cable included and we used that to charge the systems for a while but that quit working.  I contacted the company and they were willing to exchange the tablet after shipping it to China.  They also said they'd fix the problem with the charger and sent me another identical adapter.I believe this company is trying to do their best but they don't have an understanding of the US Market, I'd purchase from a different supplier.I also thought the tablet had two cameras, it only has a front facing one.

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: Natalia
Reviews.Content: I didn't have high expectations when I purchased this for my 7 year old son, however, this didn't even meet those expectations.  It started freezing week 1, the volume button broke from turning up and down, it shuts down on its own, doesn't always start up.  It has ben a nightmare.  I wish I would have spend a little bit of extra money to get one worth spending the time.  My son doesn't play with it half the time because it's always freezing or force closing apps.  I won't touch it because I get even more frustrated with it.  NOT WORTH IT.

Reviews.Title: Useless, returned next day
Reviews.Author: Fleur-de-lis
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd "no-name" cheap tablet we purchased for our 4yo daughter. The first one worked for over a year which I consider a fair return on what we paid for it. Since that tablet is no longer on the market, we purchased another "no-name" device, figuring it'll all be the same. Boy, we were so wrong.To start with some positives, this tablet looks cool. It is small and lightweight, and it connected to our wifi fast. Now I will elaborate on why I gave it one star. We don't expect much of those cheap tablets, we only want it to load and play the internet videos and display pictures. That is what our daughter uses it for. However, this tablet would not load the videos. Youtube website will load, but the video will be loading and loading forever. It might have loaded eventually, but I never waited for longer than 5 minutes. I figured, it it takes 5+ minuted for a simple few minutes video to load, my daughter will have a problem with it. I was very disappointed, I so wanted to keep this little tablet.Another thing we noticed, is that the tablet would shut down periodically on its own. What the heck is that, so annoying. Plus the battery life is measle, it lost 50% of its charge in about 30mins being turned on and connected to wifi. And finally, I made sure I ordered a black device. However, the one delivered to us was red. The stylus was not included either, although advertised.All in all, this parody of a tablet went back the very next day. Amazon was great, made the return easy, fast and simple. Needless to say, I would strongly advise to stay away from this product. It is just a waste of money, time and energy.

Is a bad battery life normal for this item?

Reviews.Author: Goggles Pisano
Reviews.Content: I purchased it for less on the sears site a few weeks ago.  I've only had the zeepad for a couple weeks so I'm not sure about reliability.  So far, I'm very happy with the purchase.  I wanted something simple to use for ebooks, occasional videos, web and email use.  I downloaded the Kindle App and it works flawlessly.  The capacitive touch screen is much better than the cheap Archos tablet I had (which quit after a year).  I watched part of a netflix video on the zeepad and it ran well, but the dark scenes didn't show up well due to low contrast.  All other applications I've run were plenty colorful and vibrant.  The processing speed seems better than other cheap tablets.  One little quirk, but so far I haven't been able to keep the time consistently accurate.  It goes back to some factory programmed time zone (maybe China).  The battery doesn't seem to last more than 2-3 hours with constant average use.  Also, the actual screen size is a little smaller than most 7" tablets but not so much it matters.  The unit does resemble a large GPS navigation system in looks (which doesn't matter to me).  Overall, I am impressed with the quality of the tablet for the price.  It's probably worth $100-$150 when compared to others I've tried.

Reviews.Title: Not the same product
Reviews.Author: onique
Reviews.Content: The tablet I received was not the same product I order!! Instead of my zeepad they sent me a Yeahpad!! It does not keep a charge!! I am so upset

Reviews.Title: A gift for my daughter=)
Reviews.Author: Lesa
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter for christmas.  I wanted to buy something cheaper than the ipad but still plays movies, apps, music.  She loves it.  It came recommended on here.  We love it!!!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Kevin D McMillan
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with what our zeepad can do.  It meets our expectations and more.  I was a little disappointed in how long it took to ship, but once the product got here it has been great.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Bunny
Reviews.Content: Ordered it just before Christmas...got it on time!!!  It was a gift and the person who got it loves it.

Reviews.Title: What I expected.
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: It works well not as fast as the more expensive tablets but much cheaper. I would recomed it to any one looking for a good price.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad Review
Reviews.Author: Makeda
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my 5 and 7 year old girls, they love it and it was good quality for the money!!  I would definitely recommend it, cause I find myself using theirs alot.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: marino fernandez
Reviews.Content: For the price its a good product. Email set up is very easy, I bought this tablet to use it while on the road. I use my phone hot spot to connect to the internet and I was pretty surprise on the speed of the tablet, I thought it would be much slower. I use it for basic stuff just to read books, go online and watch some videos. The screen is really responsive, the tablet comes with head phones but the material is really cheap I didn't even bother on putting it on, it also come with a screen protector A+, charger, usb cable and a stylus pen (very nice). I also like that you can also charge it via usb since the charger pin looks a little fragile, so when that brakes you can always use the usb. I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: 7" Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: I just received my zeepad yesterday...I am very happy with this product.  I am suprised how fast it is...The picture is great....For the small amount it costs, it a great deal!.....

Reviews.Title: good for what I paid for it
Reviews.Author: NoDakGrl "nodakgrl"
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it.  It does all that it needs to do.  Its not the best picture, but for just basic internet viewing and watching movies and videos.....it is good.

Reviews.Title: Kids love it!
Reviews.Author: Norfis Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Worth the wait... Didn't get it on time, but better late than never... Good tablet for kids and adults too.

Reviews.Title: Made my 8yr old son the Happiest kid this Christmas!
Reviews.Author: mkreader
Reviews.Content: This purchase was the best purchase i could have made.  My 8yr old son wanted a tablet like his father, but I didn't want to invest a lot of money.  This does everything i needed it to do.  Shipping scared me a little it was towards the end of the delivery time that i was quoted, but it did arrive. Thank you!!!

Reviews.Title: Dont order
Reviews.Author: Austen
Reviews.Content: Read all the reviews prior to ordering n thought people were maybe just over exagerating this shit sucks, i ordered 2 of them the first coming 2 weeks later when shoulda only took 3 days maybe if it was ups id understand but not mail thats fast, showing the laziness of the seller. On top of that just as other reviews say they come scratched your either selling me used shit calling it new Or dont know how to pack stuff corrctly knowing its going across country. The second ones taking longer n ill be suprised if it shows up before christmas.  Im sure my gf n gma will still like them but for the price at least take care of it n if they dont plan on refunding my account for both n receiving them back its bull shit i spend almost 170 for crap.

Reviews.Title: Very good product...
Reviews.Author: denis
Reviews.Content: I recieved this the day I was supposed to, I love it... don't believe all the negative reviews you read about this. So far it does everything I want it to do. The battery life is not very long it lasts about 2.5 hrs before it needs charged. The wifi works great, I get a signal in places I usually don't. The screen is bright and the colors are great, I have not watched any videos on it but the one it came with and it was crystal clear. Games work great on this, I have several so far, I do recommend getting a card for it to hold more...but overall it works great. The touch screen is very responsive, I did have to tap it a couple of times to get it to respond, but overall it's not a high end high dollar tablet. so far i am very pleased with it...

Reviews.Title: Handy item
Reviews.Author: Dian C Flouro
Reviews.Content: This item is easy to carry and use at work, and will come in handy for travelling verus carrying a laptop.I was not thrilled w/the seller, as it took a very long time to get to me.I recommend the product, not the seller I purchased it from.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply made power cords
Reviews.Author: Barbara Cloney
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these for my twins:First Issue: a prong broke off of the wall power cord IN THE WALL... thank God my 4 year old didn't try to take it out on his own.  Second Issue: Other twin's power cord came bent and doesn't work.Third Issue:  After contacting Amazon and finding that there was no contact phone number for distributor, I got a new Zeepad in the mail.  THIS power cord doesn't even fit into the device, therefore rendering that power cord useless....LAST and FINAL:  Resorted to the USB port to plug into the computer.  Son brought USB to show me....missing the metal part that goes around the prongs that go into the computer.  The metal that protects these prongs was still stuck into the USB port of my computer.The device itself is fine....IF YOU CAN GET IT CHARGED!

Reviews.Title: replaced
Reviews.Author: Alan gavami
Reviews.Content: This is an addition to my original review. The company edge cuter send me another zeepad for my doughter, but my doughter was now disappointed with the product. So I emailed the company and they worked with me to get this problem resolved. My son wanted a blue colored one. So I send the new pink one that I just had received in the mail and they send me aBlue colored zeepad for my son. It is not the fastest tablet but for the price and the companies cooperation in resolving this problem, I can't really complain. They fix the  Issues and improved their shipping methods, so the electronics are more protected during shipping. Because I know UPS or USPS just throw boxes around and couldn't care less what's in them. So overall as far as customer service the company did a great job, and my son loves his blue color tablet. It is his first one, and its been working fine so far. Thanks GaryAlan gavami.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Anita Gillyard
Reviews.Content: For the price it is great. However it's not the highest quality. The kids are happy to have it. Functions are suitable for most activities.

Reviews.Title: Pink Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Kimbrough
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it. I love the color, shape, and even the fact that its android. The only problem is that it dies really fast, even when I'm not on it. But the fact of how cool it is blows that fact away.

Reviews.Title: She's Happy
Reviews.Author: Jade231
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves her first tablet. She not big on current technology. (Hard to believe in today's society. Right) She just wanted a tablet (check). To be able to access the internet (check) and to be able to play games (check). She's satisfied. I'm satisfied . My job is done.

Reviews.Title: Amazing hardware for so little money
Reviews.Author: ZeRoDeLaY
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 10 year old son. He and I both love thia tablet. It is super fast, holds tons of apps and never seems to slow down. He uses it for netflix and games everyday. Netflix, youtube and every other app seems to work perfectly. If I could do it over again I would buy two of them Thats how awesome it is!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for price
Reviews.Author: Amanda Firkins
Reviews.Content: This tablet was bought for my 7 year old daughter as a Christmas present. It does pretty much anything that any other basic tablet would do. My daughter loves it.

Reviews.Title: Great Kid's tablet!
Reviews.Author: Nicole E. Trammell
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 12yr old to watch movies and play games.  It has been great.  Works for youtube, email and other social networking.  The camera isn't that good, but everything else seems to be working great.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Charles Hammond
Reviews.Content: shipped quickly, they are very slow compared to my S4, but that is what i expected for $62.  They (eventually) run every app I have tried and it helps to teach my kids patience.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Christina Hagan
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 11 year old for Christmas.  He's had it for 3 months and mostly plays games on it.  His only complaints are that it is slower than he would like and that the touch is sometimes delayed.  He has been able to download several games with no problems.  He had one issue with it freezing and showing only lines when rebooted but after letting it sit overnight is was fine.  Haven't had a problem since.  I think it is a great deal for the price we paid.  After 6 months if anything changes I will update my review.

Reviews.Title: Worth The Price
Reviews.Author: John B. Emerson
Reviews.Content: it's well worth the price ($62), I use it to watch videos, they look great, speaker stinks but sounds great with headphones or buds...works good with skype....processor is slow at times...main camera is lousy but camera facing you is ok for skype...also use it to read pdf and other documents, works ok most of the time, need the lighting to be right...using a 16gb micro card, works fine....battery only lasts 3-4 hours if you leave it on, lasts much longer if you power it off....AC power cord charges much faster than usb, actually came with a fully charged battery which was surprising...accepts most popular apps...get what you pay for, I'm happy with it

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Kayla Metcalf
Reviews.Content: Can not beat the price. Bought for my 8 year old daughter. She loves it and it competes with $400 tablets. I thought it was going to be very slow, but I want one now!

Reviews.Title: not a bad deal,  but description lies.
Reviews.Author: magda
Reviews.Content: the shipping was fast,  the device works,  but the specs are dishonest.  it says 4GB capacity,  but it only came with one,  and one for the sd card.  i had to put an 8GB sd card before i gave it to my friend as a gift.  i couldn't just guve it to her with such grossly unmet specs.  i dont know if dealers know this,  but it is illegal to sell some something that does not match it's advertised description.  you can't someone you're gonna sell them a chicken,  and give them a dog.  who do approach about compensation??

Reviews.Title: Very easy to operate!
Reviews.Author: jamie hang
Reviews.Content: Resolution is not as good compare to the higher end tablets but still a good quality overall. So far no lag and runs better than expected. Perfect for the younger ones.

Reviews.Title: temp tablet won't last long
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Robbins
Reviews.Content: Worked great for 6 months then power button came off power board and there is no way to repair it.  Spend a little more or buy one with a repair/replacement plan.

Reviews.Title: Help
Reviews.Author: Norma Ruckey
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of the ZEEPad's  On this one (pink) the camera picture is blurry.  the other (green) the picture is OK.  I already have several apps downloaded and e mail set up and have since thrown away the return slip.  I am leaving Thursday for a week.  So I am hesitant to return.  Is there anything else I cando.  Everything else seems OK with the exception of the fuzziness of the camera.  Maybe there is a focus button I cannot locate.

Reviews.Title: good if you plan on buying protection plan at time you buy tablet otherwise not good item
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: i have bought two of these for my 11 and 10 yr old boys who only use them indoors sitting down no rough housing or anything like that and they seemed to be really good at first. the first one bought was working fine then only two months later it stopping working correctly. a month after i bought the first i bought a second one and when it arrived it already had problems with some things now only over one month of having it the touch screen stopped working also. so with in few mo s both are not able to be used due to touch screen not working anymore. if u buy this also buy protection plan. because if not you will be stuck with useless electronics also.

Reviews.Title: Bad choice
Reviews.Author: carolyn chandler
Reviews.Content: This was a piece of junk and the seller never responded to my request for help.it worked for two weeks and then the tabs started to fall off form the inside and it was humpy dumpy from that point on. I'm not poverty stricken,but I don'tHave that kind of money to just give away.No matter how old the child is don't disappoint them with this product.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Sharon Perry
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my grandaughter. It was slow from the start & I should have returned it then but made the mistake of letting her keep it, now three months later it doesn't work at all, it is junk! I should have got her a Kindle or a Nook, I guess you get what you pay for! I received no help from the seller or the manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: Thought it would last longer than 2 months!!
Reviews.Author: cdhj1234
Reviews.Content: Had this tablet for 2 months. It has frozen several times and now will not hold a charge. The charger broke within the first month. The tablet will not charge at all now. I can't return it because it is out of the time window to return. No idea how to contact seller!! Very frustrating!!

Reviews.Title: Slows and freeze up often
Reviews.Author: Donaisha Walker
Reviews.Content: Terribly slow!!!!! Don't buy! I buy it for my child who loves tablets even she can't deal with the  terrible drag....

Reviews.Title: excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Ana Jacquelinne Bueno Perez "Miami"
Reviews.Content: my daughter loved it.!! she can surf the net, go to her facebook and play some games. Has loads of applications to download, plus you can use nexflix and you tube. I recommend it, for me it was an excellent buy.

Reviews.Title: Not much of a bargain IMO
Reviews.Author: dauntless
Reviews.Content: This is only my second tablet, ever.The reason I only give it one star is because the battery sucks.  The hyped 3 hour run time (which isn't all that great to begin with) is in reality more like 20 minutes or less.  Charging takes awhile and the charging power supply gets warm so it seems to be working, but the battery is weak.  (wifi on notifications off, screen brightness set to ~80 percent)The screen resolution looked pretty good until I loaded some pictures and test patterns into my Ainol Elf 2 (another bargain priced brand X tablet) and compared them side by side, the Elf wins hands down.  The Zeepad does have a somewhat better viewing angle, but the display looks "flat" compared to the Elf.I never could get Netflix to work.  (and hadn't gotten it working on the Elf either until just recently)  Unfortunately my wife has the Zeepad now so I can't try messing with Netflix, but I suspect the newest Netflix app will work on it.If you have problems with Netflix Google for "com.netflix.mediaclient_3.0.0 build 1010.apk" That is the latest Netflix app and seems to be working.  No need to register with an app store and it can be found on the net for free.I  haven't decided what to do about the battery problem.  I can replace it for $10-15 but that option isn't going to be open to most of the people that buy these things.12/6  My wife has had it all the time so I don't really get a chance to play with it.  (I got it as a test bed for learning how to update android, etc.)  I'm getting her a Lenovo tablet for Christmas...  Anyhow I'm noticing the screen on hers is scratched pretty badly, my Ainol, in comparison, still looks pristine (and I'm not gentle with it).  I think we are seeing the difference between acrylic and polycarbonate judging by the scratches.Battery life is still bad, but she can get ~1 hour if she turns off the wifi, and app updater (which needs wifi to work). I also got her a new charger and that has been working faster than the one supplied.  She still runs the display at 100% brightness which eats some run time, compared to the 80% I was using.Netflix is working like a champ now.  Ap update worked wonders.  Of course the wifi must be on so the battery life is shortened.

Reviews.Title: I hate it
Reviews.Author: Tamara Saint-Joie
Reviews.Content: Just brought this for my son  it's already not working the first day he had it. Very upset.  With product.

Reviews.Title: Daughter Love It!!
Reviews.Author: Uncle Sam "rome_04"
Reviews.Content: We were getting tired of the kids using our phones and tablets...  So i purchased the Zeepad for my daughters B-Day.  For the price its not a bad deal...  battery does not last as long as my tablet...  but i consider that a bonus cause it limits the time she spends ruining her eyes...lol  And she loves it!!  Going to order one for my son next week!!!

Reviews.Title: hangs a little sometimes
Reviews.Author: Terri H
Reviews.Content: Hi, this is my very first tablet, so I am not an expert.It comes with a lot of accessories. But I haven't used them.It is very cute, and for what I paid I am happy.  But it seems like the RAM is not really sufficient for some apps.I can run kindle ok, which is what I really want to use it forSome embedded videos in websites don't really play right. I think because there is not enough memory in the tablet.  I installed google chrome and that seems to work better than the default browser.When I start apps, sometimes the screen goes black... but if I wait about 20 seconds I will see the app interface.Once apps are started up, they run ok.To make the tablet run smoother I disabled notifications, that helped a lot.I am happy with the purchase so far.  I might update the review in a few weeks.For 60 bucks, it is REALLY nice.  I can get away from the computer and still do some things. I love the pink.  I bought a pink cover for it.Filemate ECO 7-Inch Tablet Faux Leather Case with Push Button Clasp - Magenta (3FMTC225MG7-R)The cover fits great, so if you want a way to protect your tab, I suggest that one. I didn't really want a keyboard case for such a small tablet. The on screen keyboard is nice. If you plan to be super productive for business, this is not your tablet because it's not powerful, but it is ok for light recreational use like kindle reading.  It works great with my subscription to Oprah :)It connects ok to my home wifi, but it didn't like the wifi at the Starbucks for some reason.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk!
Reviews.Author: KristinE
Reviews.Content: This pad is already loaded to the max with the operating system and the one game that is preloaded on it. If you can use it just the way it is and don't want to down load anything like books, music, games, etc. then you're fine. But what's the purpose of having a pad if you can use it with the stuff that's pre loaded on it! I am thoroughly disappointed!

Reviews.Title: Pretty Disappointed...
Reviews.Author: J. Crouse "Entrepreneur"
Reviews.Content: The 1st problem with this product is that the "manual" is written in what appears to be pidgeon English...and the type is so tiny that even using a magnifying glass doesn't help! So, when it comes to set up and/or troubleshooting, you are pretty much on your own.Battery life is less than stellar. The weaker the battery, the slower & less responsive the programs become. And there are warnings all over the place not to overcharge the unit, so it's always an up & down experience.Overall...I don't like the Zeepad 7". I found it just way too hard to navigate. I plan to try to return it...especially when I can get a new Nook tablet that I know is far superior for only $30 more.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Robyn Bible
Reviews.Content: Very functional, perfect for my 9 year old daughter. Small enough to take anywhere! She loves it! Definitely a must have for road trips.

Reviews.Title: Should be in the toy department
Reviews.Author: RanMan "RanMan"
Reviews.Content: The sellers really should sell them in the toy department.  I think this is misleading.  These things work for a short time and then the quit responding or operating as they should.  I bought them for my kids, but it was a huge disappointment.  Their state of excitement did not last very long.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: KArmstrong
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my daughter who just turned 9, she uses it everyday for reading,watching her Netflix, and playing games. It's not an iPad or kindle fire just a very good device for its price

Reviews.Title: really good tablet
Reviews.Author: dillon christopher duke
Reviews.Content: ok to start it was a really nice tablet. mine broke bc i dropped it. but the way i dropped any tab would have broke.i really enjoyed it it was kind of slow but for just day to day use it was reall great. i highly recommend this for any body any age. goodios got it to me at the right time and they gave great service. thank you!!

Reviews.Title: Purchased for my 7 year old & he LOVES it!
Reviews.Author: A Nu Redd
Reviews.Content: I didn't want to spend as money on a tablet for my son as I did for my Ipad because I was scared he wouldn't take care of it and it would be down the drain. I ran across this one on Amazon and figured for the price, I wouldn't be upset should he damage or break it. To my surprise, he has had this for over 6 months, there are no scratches, he has all of the games he wanted, and he has accidentally dropped a few times & there has been NO damage to report at all! It  takes a licking and keeps on ticking! Perfect for younger children. Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: useless..
Reviews.Author: Esmeralda
Reviews.Content: It's useless , this is the second one i bought and once again it doesnt want to charge and i've bought like 3 chargers for it already . waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Not many apps but it is decent
Reviews.Author: G. Lynch
Reviews.Content: this is for my son and at its price I feel like it does what it can.  So its a decent buy.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: SheriK
Reviews.Content: This is a good tablet for the price, the screen protector was a little tricky to get the bubbles out,but I bought it for a 4 & 5 year old so I  didn't want nothing to fancy. I would buy it again!

Reviews.Title: Would not purchase again
Reviews.Author: autumn
Reviews.Content: My daughter worked this summer to save money to purchase a tablet. We found this one and thought we would give it a try. The charger didn't work, when we contacted the seller they told us to use a cell phone charger ( not what I paid for) also it freezes a lot. Would not purchase another one.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Vulpie
Reviews.Content: I don't have a laptop and being a design, a tablet would be a great tool so I bought the Zeepad because it's cheap and the reviews were great! I was pleasantly surprised by all of the stuff it came with (usb adapter to upload my portfolio, screen protector, stylus, etc) and by how responsive it is! It's just as quick as my Dad's $200 tablet but for more than half the price! It's small, but I don't need anything too big anyway, and the camera is nice to skype with my friends (note: if you're going to use skype, uninstall the skype app that comes with it and install the current version from the play store, otherwise video doesn't work). The only real complaint I have about it is the battery life but that's fine by me considering it's price. Well worth it!

Reviews.Title: WoPad 8
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: It tends to run a little hot. Can be tough to hold. Freezes sometimes and seems to kick the Wifi modem off a lot on certain downloads. Color is nice. Screen is ok. Camera's are weak. But for the money and Pacman type apps and the fact it does browse the internet and do most basic functions I guess its Ok. Battery time could be a little longer. 1st run it stayed up about 6 hours. After that the battery time seems to be on average of about 2 hours. Chord is to short to run on charger. If you do run on charger it gets really hot. If it lasts a year I'll consider it worth the money paid.

Reviews.Title: zpad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Perfect size. Battery life could be a little longer. Needs car charger. Operating system a little slow. Otherwise awesome product.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Jak8787
Reviews.Content: Everything internal was shifted, none of the ports lined up with the plugs, same with the power button, it was partially depressed on one side.

Reviews.Title: returned it
Reviews.Author: DP
Reviews.Content: Tablet is really slow, major delay in typing as well, after two weeks the charging port broke so I returned it which was very easy to do through Amazon, they sent ups the next day to pick it up

Reviews.Title: Not a premium device
Reviews.Author: dwane everett
Reviews.Content: this is an okay product my 10 yo loves hers they break easy limited storage capacity and the battery really sucks i would not get another nor would i recommend and the charger breaks very easily

Reviews.Title: No extended warranty
Reviews.Author: B.I.C. LINE COMPANY
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 & both stopped working after 2 months. I cannot even return these for replacement or repair after the 30 days window expired. I would not recommend these to anyone. Buying something cheap every 3 months does not make sense. Better buy something 3 times the price that will work for years

Reviews.Title: Perfect for My Grandson
Reviews.Author: BetsyDavis
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect starter "iPad" for my grandson.  He is always wanting my iPad and this was a great solution. The setup was very easy and I am happy with the sale, and delivery.

Reviews.Title: zpad great purchase
Reviews.Author: loganzz1
Reviews.Content: This product met all but one of my requirements. It does not have a universal power cable. Mini or micro. Other than that it does everything my kids need in fact 4 days after I got it I purchased a second one for my 12 year old and he can't put it down.. so in my opinion its great for 7 year olds as well as pre teens...

Reviews.Title: Well wtf.
Reviews.Author: Astreja
Reviews.Content: Fast delivery. slow device. small. lightweight. cute. horrible camera. doesn't hold a charge for more than an hour. good for games. you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for*************
Reviews.Author: Laci Ledbetter
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these, one for each of my children.  I am dealing with setting them up and downloading the games and such for the kids, because I want to control what they see.  Here are the issues I have noticed so far with these tablets...1.) Response time is ridiculously slow.  You hit "Install" and it MIGHT flip screens 30 seconds later.  If it doesn't it will "time out" ... Timing out happens consistently.  I don't know how the games are with response time, I haven't had the patience to even try.  The kids haven't complained, but they are just happy they have a tablet.2.) The screens aren't very sensitive.  I realize that screens can be too sensitive but I shouldn't have to jam my finger on the screen to get it to respond.  Very annoying.3.) Low quality graphics -- honestly, I didn't expect much from a $70 tablet, but just thought I would let you know. It's no ipad or Kindle with the graphic quality.4.) Battery life. .... It. Dies. FAST.  I was just TRYING to download a game on one, it gave me the "You're at 14% notification" and literally less than 5 minutes later when I went to plug it in, it was already down to 9%. This is supposedly a brand new tablet.  We literally got it in the mail yesterday. (Please note that we've had the other one for several weeks, so I'm not writing this review without having used this.)5.) Very cheaply made.  The Power Off button feels like it's going to fall off it's so loose. The camera is crooked and my daughters pad is coming apart in the middle. When I say "very," I do mean VERY cheaply made.6.)  The "User Manual" is supposedly written in "English" however, it doesn't even make sense.  Here is a sentence from the "User Manual"  "#3 Check the music file wherther damaged. Try playing other music, if the file have damaged may lead to serious noise or hop sounds."  ---that is letter-for-letter.  Huh?If you're wanting a serious tablet.  Avoid this one. I only gave it a star, because I had to. Like I said, the kids don't complain - they are just happy to have a tablet but I am not satisfied and would not use this for myself.  If I had purchased this for myself, I would have returned it immediately.  Will update this review if something changes, but I doubt it will.

Reviews.Title: It only lasted for three months
Reviews.Author: carole
Reviews.Content: I purchase this table for a teenager who found it limited, slow and flimsy slow.  The major issues were the power plug and ability to connect to computer

Reviews.Title: Quit working within 3 months
Reviews.Author: C. I. Ponzi "addicted to reading"
Reviews.Content: Bought this in April by the end of June the screen went black and never came back. Couldn't fine anywhere to send back amazon doesn't even give an address for returns. Total waste of money for the time we had it. By the way wasn't dropped or wet or misused just quit working.

Reviews.Title: changed my mind
Reviews.Author: sewsherry "sherry"
Reviews.Content: I loved this tablet when I first got it.  I gave it a shining review. It seemed perfect.  But after  3 months, it stopped holding a charge. and then the place where you attach the plug to the devicestarted getting loose, and then broke completely, and I am very careful with my stuff.

Reviews.Title: Great 1st tablet...
Reviews.Author: linda
Reviews.Content: The Zeepad 7.0 came on time. I am pleased with it and my Grand daughter who is 6 LOVES it. Adding Apps through Google Play is fast and easy. The apps run smoothly. We have yet to figure out all of its many functions. My only complaint is that everyone...even Grandpa want's to play it and the charge doesn't last long enough....But we really like it.

Reviews.Title: Cheap - Sometimes you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: I was excited as this was a cheap tablet that had decent reviews... unfortunately mine broke within a week.  I was hoping to have a cheap alternative for my 3 year old twins to play with instead of using dad's ipad.  Unfortunately this one did not meet the grade.  These broke shortly after purchasing.  One had a screen damaged after putting the tablet in a bag along with other books.  The other one is still working but is slow and unresponsive.I work in IT and was hoping to avoid paying for a more expensive unit.  This is one time that I wish I would have just bit the bullet and purchased an ipad.  The Zeepad that didn't immediately break is slow and just sits on the shelf.  I now still have to wait my turn to use my ipad.

Reviews.Title: It very nice
Reviews.Author: Rodney Treadway
Reviews.Content: It very entertaining to used. I Love the  size and the price the speed is good when accessing programs or website. I have a iPad but I found myself using the ZeedPad more. Mind you IPad is very, very fast but also very, very expensive. I leave the iPad at work and take the Zeepad with me every where I go. The camera is O.K. But In time Zeepad may increase the resolution. But again for the price It very nice.

Reviews.Title: Frustrated
Reviews.Author: judy
Reviews.Content: I'm really not sure how I like it. The chargers don't work unless I hold them a certain way, and when I went to send it back. I broke the screen in the parkinglot of the UPS store. And of course they wont replace it because the screen is now broke. So now I have bought a replacement screen, and of course that is cracked as well. I'm starting to think that amazon is not for me...

Reviews.Title: 7" zeepad 7.0 allwinner A13 Boxchip Cortx A8 Android 4.0 4GB Capacity
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey G Harwood
Reviews.Content: Tablet charger had a broken wire inside plugin unit. Tablet quit working within 6 weeks. Bought a new tablet atwalmart for less money. So far so good on the new tablet.

Reviews.Title: 7" Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Zoe Best
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 Zeepad's for my grandkids and one for myself.  It is great for a kid but for me it was slower than I had hoped. I still play games on it and considering the price it is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Horrible product
Reviews.Author: Ksm
Reviews.Content: I brought 2 of these and they are horrible. I first brought 2 from another store and decided to but 2 more thur amazon....worst mistake. The products reject alot of apps that are offered in the App Store. The power level is ridiculous! They have to stay charged! They are very thin avid made of really light plastic! DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY! Put a few extra dollars with it and get a better product or just buy from another store. Only my amazon products were horrible. The exact same items purchased from another store were just fine!

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: ismo
Reviews.Content: I can't pan this product as my expectations were low. I mean what do expect from a $70 computer, but ultimately I found it too slow to be of any use to me. I'm not sure whether the processor was at fault or the wireless card but it did not even surf the internet efficiently. I had hoped to use it for dictation but found that an impossibility as the only way it could process speech was if I spoke one...word...at...a...time with a lengthy pause between them.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Paul 6267
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 10yo daughter and have not had any problems with it, other than the battery seems to deplete quite quickly but overall this is a great product. She has tons of games downloaded on it she does research for reports, reads news and watches movies on it all with no problem. This is a really good product and with the addition of a tf card this tablet is just as good as my apple ipad.

Reviews.Title: Wrong Product
Reviews.Author: Nathan M. Russler
Reviews.Content: I was not shipped a Red Zeepad Android Tablet.  I was shipped something similar, but it was Black, and had none of the features described in the description.  None of the Apps were pre-loaded, although that was an easy fix.  It did not come with a bonus stylus, screen protector, or earphones, as advertised, just a AC adapter-type charger that doesn't work.  It will hold a charge and let my kid play with it (for about 2 hours) if you use a standard micro-USB-type charger.I wouldn't get anything else from this seller ever again.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet Great Price
Reviews.Author: Johnny5.Ontime
Reviews.Content: Bought the pink Zeepad for my daughters 8th birthday, she has been using it everyday for the past 2 months and it hasnt lost a step, works great, great response to the touch and that was one of my major concerns. I have handled other cheaply priced tablets and the response to the touch is not as fast as it should be, this tablet however reacts very quickly and all apps work just like they should no issues, I would recommend this tablet for anyone, especially if your looking to get one for your child and are afraid to spend a few hundred dollars with the notion that they are just children and could break the item so if that happens the cost of the tablet is within reason to just get a new one lol

Reviews.Title: For my daughter
Reviews.Author: Pat Sadler
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves it.  She left it in a friend's car and he used it and loved it.  So, this seems to be a winner.  I have a Kindle and for the price difference, this can't be beat.  She says the camera is also very good.

Reviews.Title: USELESS
Reviews.Author: tedward
Reviews.Content: The screen parted from body as I tried to get protective package cover off. Cracked the screen and unit went dead!!

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: C. Kulik
Reviews.Content: For the price, I find the Zeepad very good.  The only thing I don't get is how to take a picture when there is no viewing hole in the back.  The only picture you can take is of yourself!  I would like it if the battery lasted more than an hour, but all in all, I think it is a good buy for what I use it for.  I have downloaded games (It comes with Angry Birds) and books.  I like it.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Lmmbee
Reviews.Content: When the tablet arrived it was extremely slow and was not compatible with many of the apps I wanted. I was told to restore it, that didn't work and then I was told to go to a website to go and do another update. After all of that it still didn't run anything.

Reviews.Title: poor battery
Reviews.Author: Tish McCracken
Reviews.Content: very poor battery life!! would not connect to wifi!,often locked while in use. cute and lite weight,loaded apps easily. returned it.

Reviews.Title: Little tablet
Reviews.Author: E. Carrasquillo "lizriver"
Reviews.Content: The plastic is a bit cheap, even for the price. Still my kids like it.  Was very disappointed you can't charge overnight.

Reviews.Title: Flemsy
Reviews.Author: Vegasguy
Reviews.Content: Don't let this thing get handled incorrectly or for that matter broken, because it wont be able to get fixed stateside and the wait roundtrip is way to long.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy!
Reviews.Author: TONYA STANTON
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet as a late Christmas gift for my son. The reviews were pretty good, and I have never had to return anything I purchased from Amazon.com. My son received this tablet at the end of January. On the outside of the box was written Tablet PC, MID Android, nothing about a Zeepad 7.0 Allwinner like the online description stated. The invoice was from a totally different vendor (from China DanDan Wu, pandawill.com) than who I ordered it from HD-Design. After about three months the device stopped charging and is no longer working. I expected my son to have this device longer than three months. Do not buy this item!

Reviews.Title: Broken :(
Reviews.Author: Jasmine Nordstrom
Reviews.Content: My daughter was super excited to receive this and she had it not even a month it was in a case it dropped the screen still broke.  I have had multiple electronics and they have dropped never broke.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Sharon R
Reviews.Content: I received this on time.  I really like it but it's a little slow when using wi-fi/internet.  I love the color and the size.  It fits it my purse. It works great with the keyboard/case that I bought along with it.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good especially for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought these for my 3 boys and they absolutely love them. They are sturdy and have great apps. My boys play on them for hours on end. I would reccommend them to everyone!

Reviews.Title: JUNK JUNK JUNK!!!
Reviews.Author: avahzd
Reviews.Content: Dont do it, do NOT let the pretty pink color or the low price trick you.  This product is JUNK.  Had it for less than two months and the battery port is loose and will not take a charge.  Tried to get Goodios to make good on this product and they will not.  It is LESS than 2 months old...  Sad thing is is that there are way too many people in the world buying this junk, then it breaks, than the company will not stand behind their products; yet, they still make tons of money off one shot buyers like me.  Once again do NOT get this tablet.  Should be called the ZEROpad.

Reviews.Title: broken
Reviews.Author: missfox
Reviews.Content: I recieved my z pad tablet with a cracked sceeen. I was very upset to find out that it cane from China and it cosr me 23.00 to return it. Highly upset. I waited a long time for it to arrive and just to open it to see the screen was cracked was very upsetting.

Reviews.Title: Wish I would have bought the protection plan...
Reviews.Author: Lisa Cline
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter as a late Christmas present; Here it is not 3 months after it shipped and the screen is shattered and it was sitting on a table without anyone touching it when it, flashed a couple times then a quarter of the screen just went black! I contacted the seller to try to get information on how to have it fixed because it is still under warranty & needs to have Any repairs done at a "Certified Zeepad Dealer" so as not to Void the warranty and got NO response other than "Sorry contact the factory!"So now I am left looking for a New tablet for my 13 year old who is pretty upset not to mention I am not too happy myself seeing as I don't have an extra $100 (with shipping and accessories) to just throw away every 2 months or so on a new tablet. JMHO

Reviews.Title: My granddaughter loves this
Reviews.Author: A. Gift For You "rainbowlaw"
Reviews.Content: She's been playing for several months and it's still going (the first one died after a few days). She loves the color, too.

Reviews.Title: I didn't expect much but got even less.
Reviews.Author: BatMan
Reviews.Content: This review is in no way, shape or form about the seller OR Amazon for that matter.  Thi is specifically about the tablet itself.  In a word... OUCH!I didn't expect much at all for this price.  I have young kids who really wanted a tablet for games etc... I didn't want to get them something that would make me hurt too bad if THEY broke it.As a techie I am aware that my personal standards may be a bit high but I tried to keep my expectations in check for the purposes of  the intended use.  a 5 and 6 year old.I ordered two of these thinking that less than 80.00 a piece for a "tech toy" can't be horrible.  Boy was I wrong.  The quality of the propduct build was about what I expected, plastic, and cheap plastic at that.  The screen, while I didn't expect it to be up to par with something like a Nexus 7, I didn't think it would be practically unviewable in portrait mode, and low visibility from certain angles even in landscape mode.I knew it would be slow, I fully expected (thus appreciated) the lag in functions.  The battery life however was a shocker.  One was dead in about 2.5 hours and the other made it about 3 hours.  Not acceptable no matter how inexpensive it was.The other thing that I noticed is that one of the tablets (though they were identical) did NOT have Zeepad branding, it was a generic of a generic, nothing to cry about since as I said before they were identical in every other way.The packaging and contents are also of a generic caliber.  One came with earphones and a cheap sylus, the other came with a cheap stylus/pen and a screen protector.Another thing that really bothered me was the jailbroken state they are in.  Makes me wonder about the legitimacy of the company. I can't say that the software was "stolen" because Android is largely open source however it did seem to be a bit janky and illegitimate.One tablet was in an Asian language with little hope to change it to english, fortunately I'm used to android and it's icons so I was able to make it through.Overall it just wasn't worth it for me to keep them, Got them on Friday, sent them back today.  Decided to get my babies a Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 instead.  They are worth the extra hundred bucks a piece :).If you order this your mileage may vary depending on your expectations of course.  As for me, I would be hard pressed to suggest this to anyone, friend or foe!

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: amv89
Reviews.Content: They sent me a broken tablet.. I couldn't believe it when it arrived. My daughter was so excited for it to arrive too. I'll change my review if I get my money back.So disappointed.

Reviews.Title: completely unsat
Reviews.Author: brian stacy
Reviews.Content: it arrived and the power button was broken on it and the battery wouldn't even charge don't buy this items i wish i would have read the reviews on this item before i bought it

Reviews.Title: RIPOFF
Reviews.Author: richkajun
Reviews.Content: DID NOT WORK RIGHT FROM DAY ONE. THIS IS A TOTAL RIPOFF AND I AM STILL TRYING TO GET REFUNDED. ITS SAD WHEN YOU BUY AN ITEM AT THIS PRICE AS A PRESENT FOR YOUR CHILD, AND IT COMES OUT THE BOX BROKEN.THEN IT TAKES AN ACT OF CONGRESS TO GET YOUR MONEY BACK OR EVEN A WORKING REPLACEMENT.

Reviews.Title: Great for my kids
Reviews.Author: Abbie L. Levanduski
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these for my kids 7 and 8.  We wanted something cheap, with quick shipping, for a trip we are taking in a few weeks.  We are not disappointed at all.  One came in the 2 day shipping and one was a day or two late.  They work perfect for them.  We updated the software to the latest, and they even come with several apps already included.  Highly recommend to anyone that is looking to purchase a tablet for a child.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet for the price.  Headphone jack NOT 3.5mm
Reviews.Author: Jericha Hawkins
Reviews.Content: It is a great tablet for the price.  I bought it to use e-textbooks in class and it functions perfectly.  Not the fastest tablet, but I don't use it for anything elaborate.My only real complaint is that the specs say it has a standard 3.5mm headphone jack, but headphones don't fit in the jack.  I just ordered a 2.5mm adapter, so hopefully that helps.

Reviews.Title: zee pad review
Reviews.Author: kalina schauble
Reviews.Content: I really like the zeepad. It came before the final date. The company emailed instantlyWhen I emailed them. The only problem was advertised new and came with scratches onThe screen. It works great. The manual was a copy. But product performs fine.

Reviews.Title: It broke in two days
Reviews.Author: Miss Holland
Reviews.Content: I received this product friday and it broke sunday whole screen just went black but as far as returning it they were very helpful

Reviews.Title: It worked fine for a few days
Reviews.Author: Jamie Donawho
Reviews.Content: It worked fine for a few days, now when I cut it on it won't go past the android screen ..  !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: did not work upon receiving
Reviews.Author: 2tyme
Reviews.Content: did not work at all upon receiving so im giving it a 1.shudnt not even be that.but will see what happen after returning it

Reviews.Title: Crap
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Had problems from opening the box. I guess you get what you pay for. I bought a samsung galaxy 7'' and Im very pleased.

Reviews.Title: A great starter tablet
Reviews.Author: Bert
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a starter tablet in order to see if I would like to invest in a higher end tablet later or buy a laptop.This tablet does a great job. The browser is a little slow at times but acceptable. I've had no problems with donwloading apps. Great for displaying photos and videos to family and friends. Be sure to get a mirco sd card with this. Right now I'm leaning toward a larger tablet.

Reviews.Title: Gifts for Christmas
Reviews.Author: Regina F. Love
Reviews.Content: Purchased about 4 of these this Christmas and they work great and everyone loves them.  My six and 7 yr. old grandaughters and my 26 yr old daughter all have them and they are user friendly.  My daughter watches movies on them and it works really good and the clarity is great.  My grandaughters played their mommy IPad so I figured these would be comparable for them..they play games on them and they are very educational with games fit for every grade level.  Love these

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: Malgorzata Czyzewska "MaggieScarlett"
Reviews.Content: A good Android tablet for this price.  Runs Android Jelly Bean which is impressive, however it force closes a lot of the apps I try to run  It's good enough for my needs though (email, web browsing, facebook, some light studying).

Reviews.Title: CHAD'S ZEEPAD
Reviews.Author: dragonsmith
Reviews.Content: THIS ZEEPAD FROM AMAZON DOES EVERYTHING THAT I NEED FOR IT TO DO. IT CONNECTS READILY TO THE INTERNET AND DOESN'T DROP CONNECTIONS VERY OFTEN ALTHOUGH IT DOES HAPPEN ON OCCASION. OVERALL I WOULD RATE IT A 5 STAR PRODUCT FOR THE PRICE THAT I PAID FOR IT.

Reviews.Title: Power Button/Speaker
Reviews.Author: Telina
Reviews.Content: My daughter absolutely love this product but as she push the power button it completely went down and then the sound went out...

Reviews.Title: works good
Reviews.Author: Bill Coffman
Reviews.Content: The tablet works good. Apps good, internet connection and all.  Only problem is the charger broke after about 2 weeks.

Reviews.Title: It is a good tablet for a kid.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It can be slow at times and require a few taps for it to respond but all in all, my nephew enjoys it.  Easy to navigate and use.

Reviews.Title: Product as describe
Reviews.Author: Orlando Nunez "Orlando Nunez"
Reviews.Content: Product as describe. Would buy again. I would gave 5 star if it give a tracking number. On your order status there a tracking number button but everytime you click on it never give any tracking number but other than that great product mostly best for kids.

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Tracy B.
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my kids for xmas & they really like it. Within the first day they were fighting over it. I should have bought another one! Good tablet for the price.

Reviews.Title: lyn
Reviews.Author: lyn
Reviews.Content: I bought 4 new zeepads for my kids ages 13 to 8. They love it. Perfect for price. Like I said I bought 4 had to return 1 to get replaced taking a while :(

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0 Allwinnwer A13 Boxchip Cortex A8 Android 4.0, 4GB Capacity, 512 MB.
Reviews.Author: Elkin
Reviews.Content: Mi experiencia con el producto es muy buena, es rapida, para el precio que tiene es muy buena compra la recomiendo.

Reviews.Title: OK for a child
Reviews.Author: A. Chiriboga "Dats it!"
Reviews.Content: I was thrilled when I realized I could gift a nephew with a touch-pad so he could enhance his writing skills. I waited for the package to arrive and it did, well ahead of the other recommended things by amazon.Unfortunately, while attempting to place the writer's, diaries and other apps, I quickly discovered it is not zoned for a worldly market. It is a Pan Asian product that has a time zone setting as far as turkey, and cannot be placed on the Proper timeline. This, I can already see will be a problem when the web based apps attempt to SYNCH. This is the only reason i subtract 2 stars. No thing should ever be a "Surprise!", when you cycle through it's features. No, it should be foretold ahead of time and guaranteed to work (in the western Zone). It is great, other than that, since this is a child's introduction to his talented development via a touch-screen/pad.Hopefully, Amazon stops surprising their customers. They fixed many things and this is just another fix needed.______-------Added------_________After ordering a keyboard, I found that the recommended keyboard/case did not work with it.I also found out that the settings on it are very limited and people, beware, Like the spam mail in you In-box, this has many "go-to" adds on many of the apps there.so If you are going to give to children, make sure they do not have CC information nor access to it.If you could tther it, even better. It could turn out to cost you more than you wanted.

Reviews.Title: zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: matt dailey
Reviews.Content: excellent product for price,my wife seems to love it . some games such as bingo blitz, you can only play 2 cards instead of 4, i guess because of size.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: Fred King
Reviews.Content: This was purchased as a Christmas present for my Grandson, and he loved it. I also ended up purchasing a key board to go along with it.

Reviews.Title: C
Reviews.Author: Thomas Gingell "Graalchild"
Reviews.Content: The price was right, It does work and my son plays games on it when we are out and about. I wanted to see if I really wanted a small pad, I like it but the screen quality is the weakest link,but I now plan on getting a Quad core 7" pad, probably a Galaxy.

Reviews.Title: Its a starter!
Reviews.Author: May
Reviews.Content: I like my zpad.the only thing thats a bummer is the camera is just front facing.Over all its really nice. My mom and nephew has em too and they were excited and happy!!

Reviews.Title: good for kids
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: Got this for my 6 year old son for Christmas.  It works pretty good for his needs.  It is alittle slow, especially when turning on.  Other then that it works great for him to play games and watch you tube on.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Douglas P. Garey
Reviews.Content: Nice pad for the money.  I purchased for my 2 children for Christmas and they have used them almost daily with no issues so far.  Great for watching Netflix and playing the apps they enjoyed on my smartphone.

Reviews.Title: Pretty decent for the price.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my mom, so I only had a couple of days to check it out before delivering it as a gift. My must-have feature was the ability to do Skype calls and it worked pretty well. It comes with the real Google Play Store, so it would be easy to install your favorite applications. Here some points to ponder:- Only front camera for video calling. The resolution is pretty decent, though the camera application was very basic. Fixed installing another app from the Play Store.- No GPS.- The items on the screen "stretch" when tablet is held vertical. No big deal, but I think that means it would be better to use it only in horizontal orientation.- Also, when transitioning (moving the tablet) between horizontal & vertical, the screen gets a little crazy swapping from vertical to horizontal. It calms down when stabilized.- Highly recommended to install the adhesive screen protector immediately after opening. Got some scratches for normal use.- Tested Skype and Youtube and both worked fine.- I couldn't test the ports or the USB cable. Adhesive screen protector and a stylus are included.EDIT: My brother told me they are having problems leaving Skype enabled all the time. I don't know what happens but it shows as if in disconnected status. Also, it seems the volume of the speakers and the sound quality is very low when in a call, compared to a Galaxy Tab 2. I assume it would be better to use headphones.EDIT2: Now that I have it back and using it everyday, I can say that is slow. I guess this is related to the small memory (512Mb). When browsing, switching between applications, or using an app constantly, it gets slower. Sometimes I get the msg saying that an app has stopped, but I just choose "Wait" and soon it gets back again. I've installed a memory management app so when the memory usage falls below 25% I run a "quick boost" to recover control. I'm using it mostly to watch Netflix in my bed (with headphones of course, as I said the speakers are awful), and it works pretty fine. Also, on the PROS side, is pretty tough; it has fallen a few times, and stands the beats as a champ. I tried to use a microSD card to free storage space, but it couldn't recognize it, don't know if the beats have something to do. The battery life is normal and the wifi reception is good.In summary, again, is pretty decent for the price but as it needs some maintenance, I would say is not recommended for a non-tech person. Being so tough, it would work also to get kids busy, for games, netflix and so.

Reviews.Title: This product is GARBAGE
Reviews.Author: LaTonya Tejada
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my 7 year old daughter. She has not been able to enjoy this at all. It freezes up, shuts off for no apparent reason and it does not hold a charge, she would have to plug it in and charge it in order to try and use it, but that didnt matter considering it would freeze. And to make matters worse she was attempting to use it today and it went blank. The screen is blank.I purchased a Google tablet from Walmart for my son and his works perfect. No ISSUES at all. It doesnt freeze up and he hadnt had his tablet on the charger in 2 days and he was still able to get on with no problems.

Reviews.Title: zeepad is a winner.
Reviews.Author: Keith Inglesby
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my daughter for x'mas, although it didn't arrive until after x'mas, which was kind of a bummer for her. So far this pad has exceeded my expectations. I have not had a problem with my charger yet, but it doesn't seem to be the right one for the zeepad. I have had no connection problems, or freezing up issues so far. I wish it had a simple case for it, but haven't found one that fits yet. Not better than my nook color, but definetly good for children of all ages.

Reviews.Title: too much hassle
Reviews.Author: Ana M Zavala
Reviews.Content: This tablet freezes all the time and I have to turn it off. and start again. and this happens with every use. not worth it. gave it to the kids so they could play. and even when they are playing it freezes.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly good!
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: I got this tablet for my 7 yer old son to play games and watch videos on.  It woks great for him.  The screen is very responsive, and it moves pretty quickly.  It works so well, I may get one for my wife too.  I think this is an excellent tablet for the price point.  However, if you do a lot of web surfing or streaming videos, you may consider upgrading to a Nexus 7 or Kindle Fire.  My Nexus 7 has a much clearer screen and is considerably faster.  That being said, the Zeepad is perfect for my son.  If you just want something to mess around with, play games, and occasionally surf the web, this is a great tablet.  If I didn't have a Nexus 7 to compare it too, I would give it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Really impressed!
Reviews.Author: Gloria N.
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 5yr old daughter for christmas.  She loves it, but I honestly love it more lol.  I have been bringing this thing with me everywhere.  Connects to wifi easily and plays netflix with no issues. It is very nice for the price paid and I'm thinking of buying another but since I've only had it a couple weeks I'm going to wait a little while to see how it holds up!  Good purchase so far though

Reviews.Title: Lasted 8 days
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Graves
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my son, in hopes he would be able to let my more expensive one go.  That he did, and boy did he love it. However the battery died and he went to charge it for the night, and it never woke up.  The back got real hot, and neither the battery or the charger will make it come on.  I would think again about purchasing this.  Hopefully the seller can help me out here, I will keep you posted.  Was his big Christmas gift, and if I can't get it to work or replaced will have to spend more money to get another.Update:Well I got a response from the seller, and they had me try some things.  Even had me reflash the tablet, yet it still doesnt turn on. Haven't heard from them in a couple days.

Reviews.Title: never order from this seller
Reviews.Author: Lisa Wirhanowicz "Lizzie Wishkabibble"
Reviews.Content: fake number on package saying it was sent out.Ruined my whole christmas,my gifts never came,i am so angry,i trusted Amazon to make sure their distributors were legit.I have ordered on amazon for years,i really at this point never want to again.

Reviews.Title: Importers127
Reviews.Author: Margaret
Reviews.Content: I purchase 2 tablets and 2 keypads from importers127 for a Christmas gift. It was suppose to arrive between Dec 20-26 by 8:00pm. It is now Dec 28 and still have not received the items or heard from importers127.

Reviews.Title: GREAT for an 8 year old
Reviews.Author: Stacie Coble
Reviews.Content: This was purchased for child that wanted ipod touch for christmas. her response to recieving this instead was - it took my breath away ; it is better than an ipod touch! Thanks for making my little girls Christmas - ps bought a used coby tablet for younger sibling for similar price and like that this one has a camera and uses google play store for downloading apps! Great product!!!

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: N. K. Sosa
Reviews.Content: got it today, very difficult to read manual.  it has to be charged before use.  totally dead battery.  after that it is pretty easy to set up.Lets eee how the kids like it

Reviews.Title: Really nice tablet!!
