Reviews.Author: Starmom
Reviews.Content: This really is a NICE tablet!  It works great, downloading apps was really quick and EASY!!  So many fun free game.I have not tryed everything, just got it a week or two ago for my 12 yr old son for Christmas.  I did play with and charge it 100% and had lots of games for him already downloaded for Christmas morning.  I only gave a 4 star because the tablet does freeze up some.

Reviews.Title: It's good for the money
Reviews.Author: Antoni Stoychev
Reviews.Content: In general no big problems with this tablet. Sometimes I had to restart my wi-fi modem, because tablet shows it's connected, but  is not. Otherwise good CPU speed and response of the screen. Runs smoothly.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my grandchildren ages 6-11.  They are all happy with it.  The protective screen and gel cover helps to protect the tablet

Reviews.Title: I wouldn't buy another one.
Reviews.Author: Cindre
Reviews.Content: Okay, so I bought this tablet in March 1, 2013 for my daughter's birthday and received it March 27, 2013. When we first got it the tablet worked fine. The screen was nice, the battery life wasn't all that good but it was okay, and it allowed us to download a few apps. But a week later part of the screen stopped responding to touch. It froze a lot, and even locked us out a few times. The camera hardly ever opened and the video calling wouldn't work at all. Finally the back randomly came off and the whole tablet just stopped. Got my money back and will not be ordering another.

Reviews.Title: absolute junk!
Reviews.Author: Christina Franklin
Reviews.Content: This tablet was a Christmas gift for my daughter.  The first day she got it, the power button locked and I couldn't turn it on at all.  So, we got a replacement one.  Now it also doesn't function properly.  The tilt doesn't function proplerly, so games like Temple Run are out.  And also, whenever she tries to get on Netflix or YouTube, a jumbled screen shows up with gibberish words and nonsense parts of pictures.  I would NOT recommend this product to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Not a bad starter tablet
Reviews.Author: Chuggs
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use as a toy, basically. I didn't need it to do much, so in that aspect it's pretty good. If you need a high-end tablet, this is not it. It freezes on me sometimes and the touch screen is quirky. The camera is surprisingly sharp and the vertical width is such that I can hold it with both hands and type using my thumbs like on my HTC Evo. I give it 4 stars b/c it's a fun toy, but it's just that...a toy.

Reviews.Title: Great For Everyone
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline M. Allen
Reviews.Content: I really like this tablet. I have nothing bad to say about it. I like it because it comes in really clear. I would recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: What a surprise!
Reviews.Author: Not So Shoe Gal
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 70-something mother-in-law, she has a very basic knowledge of electronics in general, so i was just hoping for something simple and functional.  This met all my expectations and more!  I played with it a bit to set it up for her and dound it very easy to navigate, good picture, responsive screen.  Don't put it head to head with an ipad or kindle, it'll just hurt Zeepad's feelings! ;)  Its a good, simple little tablet to use for watching knitting videos on youtube!

Reviews.Title: I Love It!
Reviews.Author: Deidre Lynn Salcido
Reviews.Content: My nephew will love this...he hasn't seen it yet.  I heard the Android technology was amazing so I purchased this over a Kindle.  I like the slim, lightweight device.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great Service!!!
Reviews.Author: FeFeG
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item through PCTVSHOP and the service they provided was awesome!!! I have absolutely no complaints what so ever! Completely satisfied and most definitely a happy customer.

Reviews.Title: My kids love !!!
Reviews.Author: brucar11
Reviews.Content: Got it for my kids on christmas ! Very good for children they can play and watch movies . Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: eh. i suppose you get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Emberlynn
Reviews.Content: i was super excited when this came in the mail, my main use for it is that i can now type outside of my house without having t o bring my humongus 16 inch laptop around with me, and i can continue my short stories while im at work, and use my friends wifi for email and facebook. i suppose it does what its supposed to do. the camera is messed up, i guess it was manufactured wrong and the acual  camera lens is below the faceplate of the tablet, so iit constantly looks like you have your finger in front of the camera, which is a huge bummer. the touch screen is glitchy, so if i want to play draw something my drawings are always squigly, and thats a shame, it also takes a few tries to acually open something when you touch it. in one area the screen is kinda soft like a laptop, if you push on it with even the slightest bit of pressure it gets a black finger print on it, its hard to explain, but its like when you push on a laptop screen and it gets a shaded area for a few seconds. all in all this little thing has potential, but i think mine was an assembly line reject.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for kids
Reviews.Author: B
Reviews.Content: I haven't found anything that is disappointing about this tablet.  The kids love it and I no longer have them fighting over my KindleFire.  Plays all the apps and Kindle app for reading books without any problems so far.  I have even left the plastic film over the screen and they don't use the stylus (just fingers) and it is very responsive.  I'd highly recommend as a purchase for kids (or even adults) who don't want to pay a lot for one to knock around with.  I ordered 3 of them and they are all great!!

Reviews.Title: Worth the $ and good test for youngsters before investing in IPad or other high $ tablet
Reviews.Author: DT
Reviews.Content: Came with crappy stylus, but convertor cables to allow USB devices to be added to the system and to be connected to other systems via USB, 512 memory sucks and unable to see how to add except for 32GB Micro SD card, but that is enough for my kids so that works. Plays music, video and video games well either streaming from NetFlix or of SD or flash drive. Kids can use it easy, I say overall def worthwhile.

Reviews.Title: Still can't believe this was only $70!!
Reviews.Author: annie79
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my 7 year old son. We charged it an played with it a little on Christmas Eve, and we were amazed how well it performed. I had thoroughly read the reviews, so I had high expectations, however, this blew them out of the water. Since it is only $70, and some people will have a hard time seeing past that to what is actually an awesome product, I will tell you the feature that I felt was lacking. To be fair, I have only used the camera one time, but the picture wasn't as great as on my phone (which takes incredible pics) or my husband's iPad, however, for a 7 year old, the pic was great. I am seriously impressed with this device, especially for a young person who isn't going to be doing too much other than playing games, and I strongly encourage this purchase, even if the price makes you leery. I would have paid more for this and still been just as happy!

Reviews.Title: Zeepa
Reviews.Author: Mr. Pilachi
Reviews.Content: good I love it I will recommend it to all my friends and will buy more in the future if I can still find them on sale.

Reviews.Title: Thought they were great at first but they started malfunctioning within a couple of weeks.
Reviews.Author: Samantha M
Reviews.Content: We ordered two of these as Christmas presents for our kids.  One came with a power button that was almost recessed into the unit.  However it still worked so we kept it.  That didn't last long and within a week or so of Christmas you could not turn the unit on at all.  We couldn't even turn it on to erase all the stored passwords to skype or Netflix etc.  We returned the unit.  My daughter's was still functioning well so we were planning on re-ordering another one for my son.  Thankfully we didn't because my daughter turned her's on yesterday morning and the tablet and reverted back to factory settings.  None of the games or other apps she had downloaded were on the tablet.  Needless to say I am returning it also.  If these tablets function properly they would be fantastic!

Reviews.Title: I never received the products
Reviews.Author: a very disappointed mom- from seller now prod...
Reviews.Content: untill now the items that I ordered from this seller never showed-up. It is really so hard when its Christmas time and my kids are so little thinking that Santa had put them on the naughty list, I have no family around and my kids only recieve gifts from us, so we ended up with no gifts this Christmas. My advice to this seller do not be in this business if you do not respect your customers. He also never replied or apologized.

Reviews.Title: I want my money back ASAP
Reviews.Author: Angry7879
Reviews.Content: This review doesn't even deserve 1 star!!!!! I am so disappointed and so is my little girl. She didn't even get a chance to see how it works. I charged it just like the instructions said to and guess what....it almost caused a an electrical fire in my home on Christmas Day charging only a few hours out of the total mentioned. I knew something was wrong when I initially plugged it in for the very first time ever,  and it got a little too hot for my taste. The thing burned a hole from the inside out, burned a hole in my carpet and luckily I caught it in time!!!!!! This could be a huge lawsuit but I'm being nice enough just to ask for my full refund. I will spend the extra money on a kindle fire. Maybe I was one of the unfortunate to receive a malfunctioned product but it was a fire hazard and I'm sorry but I can't say anything nice. You have to understand the fustration coming from our end. This product should be discontinued. Its my fault for a. being "cheap", and b. not doing my homework!!!

Reviews.Title: WOW REALLY
Reviews.Author: MAD
Reviews.Content: Wow suppose got the tablet on the 26. Having even gotta it yet smdh. I knew it wasn't coming before Christmas but the day after wasn't a big deal. They take your money so fast. Either I want the tablet or my money back.

Reviews.Title: Flustered
Reviews.Author: Diggity
Reviews.Content: I'm sure it will be great once I receive it!! It has changed dates twice as to when I'm going to receive it! The latest is after christmas! Man it must be busy sending packages out.

Reviews.Title: 4 year old hates it.
Reviews.Author: S Reese
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 4 year old a few months ago because she constantly takes my Ipad mini to watch cartoons on Netflix.  At first she liked it.  About a week went by when she started swiping my Ipad again.  I asked her why and she said that it wouldn't cut on.  So after charging it and getting it boot up she started to use it again(for 2 days).  Then she kept bringing it back to me because she didnt like the way the movies looked and that they kept stopping.  Thats when I started to play with it more. I noticed that the batties didnt last long at all.  3 to 4 hours on avarage.(if you are not watching netflix)  The screen has to be viewed head on like an old computer monitor and freezes all the time when using Nextflix.  I have seen better screens on cheap smart phones.  And this thing is slow!!  I though that the thing was gonna be A LOT faster than this.  So when a 4 year old can pick out things she doesnt like on a tablet like an adult would that should tell you something.  Maybe the Ipad spoiled her but either way I am shopping for another tablet for her Christmas present.  I'm going with the Kindle fire or the Kurio 7 this time.  I am tired of having to give up my Ipad yet again!!  LOL  Do yourself a favor and spend the extra money for a faster tablet!!

Reviews.Title: this thing is crap
Reviews.Author: Katie Quessenberry
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my daughter when it got here it turned on just fine but when I turned it off and back on it froze on me not letting me unlock it or power it off this thing was really cheaply made i would not recommend this to any one.

Reviews.Title: Did I get a different tablet?
Reviews.Author: Hjsmith
Reviews.Content: Uh.... All the good reviews... What? This tablet is JUNK! It takes 2 minutes for a page to load, and the camera you can only take pics of yourself. Please spend a few more bucks and get a real tablet! Lesson learned!

Reviews.Title: very happy customer
Reviews.Author: Melissa Dougan
Reviews.Content: We ordered this zee pad for our 13 year old daughter she found an app that lets her text for free no more 300 dollar phone bills and its just as nice as our name brand tablets are it shipped very quickly and we use it everyday couldn't be any happier with our purchase thankyou amazon .com we will be comming back for great deals in the future

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!
Reviews.Author: pissed off
Reviews.Content: NEVER GOT MY ORDER THESE PEOPLE WILL  TAKE YOUR MONEY AN WILL NEVER RESPOND TO YOU AGAIN!!!!!!! DON'T FALL FOR IT!!!! THESE PEOPLE STOLE MY CHILDS CHRISTMAS GIFT!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: yorleny Dominguez
Reviews.Content: My daughter loved it, great tablet for kids i had no problems with it. So i really recommend this for kids.

Reviews.Title: Skip this one
Reviews.Author: Bradley Johnson
Reviews.Content: Received this as a gift in March, along with a keyboard, as I planned to use it for writing. At first it was great, no problems. Then I started populating it with apps- and by "populating" I mean I downloaded two, and it slowed down. While connected to my home Wifi, it acted slower than if it were operating on dial up. Even disconnected and only opening apps was appallingly slow. One may sound spoiled by making such complaints, but I just think a thing should work as intended.I dared not load games on this thing as I feared it would melt, and decided to only use it as a reader and for using Evernote. Both were still incredibly slow and just plain frustrating. Reading apps took forever to load, and despite my less than speeding typing, it couldn't keep up: I'd type a sentence on the keys only to watch as the letters on the screen tried (and often failed) to follow suit. I considered being done after I noticed this, but decided to just read with it. Until today. After reading on it last night, I awake to find it will do nothing. I'm pretty sure the battery is charged- can't know for sure as the screen is dead,just like my faith in this product.

Reviews.Title: Wont charge
Reviews.Author: Misty Hanke
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son for Christmas. It lasted 5 months. It won't turn on or charge. For the price, it was a great little tablet. He did all kinds of games and was able to watch Youtube videos on it. I thought it was great! But sad that it's now broken.

Reviews.Title: JUNK JUNK JUNK! Avoid this item!
Reviews.Author: kmiles
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our 9 yr old daughter for Christmas and were very disappointed.  The second you add maybe two apps to the thing, it completely freezes, crashes or simply turns off.  DO NOT PURCHASE THIS ITEM.  If you are looking for a tablet for a kid, you're better off spending a bit more for something that actually functions, or even a Nintendo DS (they can play games and watch netflix/youtube on that too!).  I should have figured that it would be junk based on the price, but the fact that they're still trying to charge even this much is a joke.

Reviews.Title: Great for kids
Reviews.Author: iginah
Reviews.Content: My two girls (9 and 7 yrs old) love their tablet. They do their basics. Go online to play games and thats pretty much it. I wouldn't recommend it for an adult. It has sort of a lag and the screen resolution isnt the best. But overall we like it!

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy!
Reviews.Author: Dell L Rice
Reviews.Content: This thing only lasted a week. We had to go to a local store and have it replaced with another one which means we spent more money. The battery did not hold a charge.

Reviews.Title: Amazing... until it stopped working!
Reviews.Author: Owen Tucker-Smith
Reviews.Content: I purchased Zeepad because I didn't want to spend too much money on my first tablet. It came in a box, and when I turned it on, It looked great. It had all these applications, and in a few seconds I had temple run. I was bringing it up the stairs. At the top when Iset it down from a few inches of the ground, instead of just landing clean like most tablets, the screen broke offpretty soon I put it back together. Right when I did, the battery ran out. Really short battery! When I recharged it, I seeked it again and pressed the power button, it went to a lock screen, but I couldn't unlock t! It didn't ask me for a password, or anything like that. It just stayed on that lock screen. Thats when the power went out for good. So it was a wonderful tablet. But it breaks and stops working so quickly after you buy. Great 1 week tablet, but terrible structure!

Reviews.Title: Same as my other one. Its a replacement fomy previous warranted item
Reviews.Author: Tia Char
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd replacement Zeepad now. Since I sent for this one I have had 2 more fritz out on me within a couple days of each other so I am not too impressed with them anymore.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Will
Reviews.Content: Was nice for my grandchild but technology moves at such great speeds it did not get much use. I will save it for my visitors that get bored with their children.

Reviews.Title: Zeerrad Android Tablet
Reviews.Author: Carolyn A. Williams
Reviews.Content: It is no good, not worth the money. I got this tablet as a gift for my granddaughter. It did not work but 2months and froze up.

Reviews.Title: IT'S "OK" BASIC SMALL TABLET.
Reviews.Author: Toots
Reviews.Content: All the specs  on this tablet were great and priced reasonably.  I had to return because the tablet would overheat and start acting up.  Probably good tablet for someone who is not a real heavy user.  Did luv the color choices.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this.
Reviews.Author: Dave C.
Reviews.Content: Bought 4 of these.. one DOA, one died a week later and one died after being knocked out of a kid's hand... you really cannot even exchange them, because they are Chinese POS.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for anyone
Reviews.Author: eb71
Reviews.Content: I bought my first one last year for my grandchildren to use as a learning tool.  I chose this tablet originally for the price as I felt it wouldn't hurt so much if it didn't survive the little ones.  It was durable and provided lots of access to learning applications.  The kids and I both have had lots of use with out issue.  I now have a total of three tablets and still believe they were worth every penny.  The camera fuction was an added bonus too.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your time!!
Reviews.Author: Peter F Neurohr "PandJ"
Reviews.Content: Sent it back, it took forever to charge and that is after struggling for it to maintain charging status, was so slow...took forever to download or play anything on it. Basically, not worth anything except frustration.

Reviews.Title: Cheap piece of junk
Reviews.Author: Quidditchmom
Reviews.Content: My son received it for Christmas and it lasted exactly three months. Now when we turn it on we get the white screen of death. Even when it was brand new out of the box, it ran very slowly and simple tasks took way too long the convenience of a table inherently promises. I wish he wouldn't have spent his birthday money buying a very nice keyboard case to go along with this. That being said, if anyone is in the market for a keyboard case, I've got one that has been in use for not even two weeks. Please, spend the extra bucks and get a Kindle.

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: melissa piatt
Reviews.Content: The product I received is NOT a name brand ZEEPAD! False advertising! My neighbor ordered a zeepad also and hers says zeepad on the back of it and mine don't! From the day I got it there has been a glitch in it and when you touch the sides of the plastic it will go to whatever it feels like going to! And one morning I had left it on all night and woke up to the stupid thing BUZZING!!!! I am NEVER going to order anything like this from any website EVER again! LIARS LIARS LIARS!!!!! The only reason I haven't tried to return it is because I don't know how. This is my first time ordering electronics and my LAST!

Reviews.Title: Needs better unpaking instructions.
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Haus
Reviews.Content: Opening the box one finds a printed insert on charging the battery and a second insert explaining that this is a brand new tablet and only looks refurbished. The battery insert says 1, never charge for more than 3 hours or the unit will explode. never operate the unit while plunged in , it will explode. Unit is shipped with an uncharged battery, charge batter for 24 hours before first use. (But you said never charge for more that 3 hours?) My Zeepad came with a fully charged battery. (a sign of it being a refurbished unit.)The refurbished Note says the unit is shipped with a screen protector preinstalled and though the screen may look scratched up, it isn't. It's just the screen protector. My unit did not come with the screen protector installed and before I realized that I managed to scratch the screen up a bit. My Zeepad fell off the table yesterday while I was charging it and it  landed on the carpet , about a 3 and a half foot fall and a soft landing. and yet the power supply connector snapped off and I now need to replace the power supply, Note: the power supply connecter is very fragile! Battery life seems to be about 2 hours and is very disappointing as You shouldn't run the zeepad while plugged in (Or it will explode!) Some areas of the touch screen are very unresponsive.  On the whole I am not thrilled with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Save your money and DON'T BUY THIS!!!!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Pogue
Reviews.Content: This was the worst product, we started having problems with in a week. The operating system would just shut down or freeze in the middle of her using it. Then we had to reset it several times. Eventually, the tab let's shattered without falling, it just started a small line in the corner and went to the middle of the screen and shattered. Save your money and just get a Samsung, Kindle, I-Pad, etc.

Reviews.Title: Dud
Reviews.Author: Joseph A Myler
Reviews.Content: Very slow, does not react well to touch, freezes up constantly, etc. Bought it for my 3-1/2 year old and she doesn't play with it but will play with my iPad and iphone constantly, not exactly a fair comparison but I thought it would be better.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad very nice
Reviews.Author: Sabina M Noel
Reviews.Content: The first two I received were broken but the third one was a charm. My son is loving his Zeepad

Reviews.Title: Charger that is included doesn't fit in the unit.
Reviews.Author: K W
Reviews.Content: There is a charger than comes with the unit, however, it does not fit not charge the unit and you have to purchase the correct charger in order to use.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: Brett Bybee
Reviews.Content: This is a terrible, one-time use, disposable piece of garbage.  We knew by the price we were getting a sub standard product, and we were okay with that, but after one week of use, no drops or abuse inflicted, the plastic started to separate at the seam.  We thought maybe we'd simply replace it.  Amazon was splendid and fast to work with on replacing the device, but the new one was defective after just ten days as well.  Do not buy.

Reviews.Title: Painfully Slow
Reviews.Author: Lee Toland
Reviews.Content: This tablet from day one has been painfully slow in the amount of time it takes to do anything: turn on, turn off, slide screens, unlock, loading the apps, games, books, movies or anything else you've put on the device and would like to watch/read/play, downloading items to the device, connecting to wifi, etc, etc, etc. I got this for my four year old as I was tired of filling up my phone with her games so she's happy despite it's slowness but I would never recommend this for anyone but a child and only for children that have a bit of patience.

Reviews.Title: TERRIBLE
Reviews.Author: NaTasha Johnson
Reviews.Content: If I can give -5 stars I would. This device didn't last a week before having issues. The vendor refused to refund my money and the so called service plan refused to service the device. It is now in the garbage where it belongs. TERRIBLE!!!!!

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: lalywright
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, this purchase falls under "you get what you pay for".  The item lasted just a few weeks before the power button broke and now the device does not turn on. It was cute while it lasted though.

Reviews.Title: The charger broke down, the camera does not have a flash. Work to slow, and its difficult to get it on.
Reviews.Author: INANGELIS GUERRA
Reviews.Content: The charger broke down, the camera does not have a flash. Work to slow, and its difficult to get it on.

Reviews.Title: Did not work out of the box.
Reviews.Author: Debbie Y
Reviews.Content: Did not work right out of the box. Triple checked it was fully charged but would not go past home screen to do anything.  Battery or software issue..

Reviews.Title: Quit after 5 Months
Reviews.Author: A. Garrett
Reviews.Content: This tablet started randomly sensing touches on the screen after a couple of months. Eventually, when I turned it on the unit would start going nuts as if I were pressing all over the touch screen. Getting my refund via Square Trade now. Poor choice on my part and poor quality product. I won't make that mistake again.

Reviews.Title: Hardware needs improving.
Reviews.Author: C
Reviews.Content: The charging port is too easily broken, especially if it is to be handled by kids. The buttons could be more sturdy as well. Apart from that it is a great tablet.

Reviews.Title: Presant for a 8 year old
Reviews.Author: j.Linduff
Reviews.Content: I got this for my 8 year old for his birthday and it works great. Now when it comes to Minion rush it is a little slow, but since my 8 year old is a HUGE mine craft fan and plays all the time, its perfect. He loves it and takes it everywhere with him.

Reviews.Title: It's alright
Reviews.Author: ALS23
Reviews.Content: Good price, cool colors, but poor screen view.  It kind of hurts the eyes to look at. Is not HD at all.  The operating system seems to be okay, but not the best.  Next time, I'd rather spend the extra $50 for much better quality.

Reviews.Title: Very poor product!
Reviews.Author: YVONNE BOWDEN
Reviews.Content: I would advise you not purchase this product.  I bought three of them for my grandchildren, and they are all a problem.  The screen blacks out, chargers don't work, and if you do get it charged, it lasts for maybe 45 minutes.  If it was jus one of them, maybe just a defective item, but all three are bad.

Reviews.Title: Didnt work from day one.
Reviews.Author: shadwina
Reviews.Content: I would rate a zero if I could, it did not work from day one, I charged it per the directions and it came on but cut right off, I tried to turn it on again by holding the button for two minutes as directed, it came on but went off again within a few minutes, I got this for my daughter as a christmas present and had to send it back. I read the reviews and seen this was a problem for other buyers, I did buy a blue one for my other daughter and that one is working, but for the problem with the pink one I wouldn't suggest anyone buying one.

Reviews.Title: Really Fast and a must have for fisrst timers
Reviews.Author: Chalie Ann Davis
Reviews.Content: Got this yesterday. I really like it. I bought it for someone and he asked me to put the games and stuff on it. I have a Motorola Atrix 2 so I know that dual core and A8 cortex means something good lol because my phone runs fast and nice. Any way I really like this tablet the dispalay is nice! The camera has flash (I was surprised at that) and there is a front and rear facing camera. I know its only 4gigs so that doesnt matter all you need is a mini sd.I have to order one of these for my self just to have being that they are only $63....when i was loading the games the tablet did reset and stay on the welcome screen but after I pluged in the charged it continued to load. I hope this isnt a problem that he will encounter alot.But none the less I will be purchasing another! Maybe a pink one becuase even though my husband has his own 10" tab he likes new stuff! -____- Now that im thinking about it my 6 and 5 year old girls having a pink tablet might draw there attention o.0

Reviews.Title: Busted!
Reviews.Author: A User
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these and all three broke very quickly.  The power buttons break and are hard to get to make a connection inside.  One started showing the script that runs in the background on the screen in the foreground and the others screen cracked far too easily.  You get what you pay for I guess.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Kerri
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son and within a month it was not working right.  I wasn't able to understand the instruction guide very well when trying to fix it.  Resetting it just seemed to make things worse.

Reviews.Title: Summary
Reviews.Author: Patricia Hilliard
Reviews.Content: For the price, very good. Purchased for a 7 yr old and a 3 yr old, both use it quite well for games. Have tried it myself and prefer it over FB for one particular game,

Reviews.Title: CHEAP QUALITY DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: April Epps
Reviews.Content: The quality cheap brought for a gift a month ago my niece jes got in town to use it the charger do not charge the thing & was usin

Reviews.Title: decent product for kids
Reviews.Author: KCG "curious"
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for a kid.  The battery has a short life, but you get what you pay for.  It runs fast for basic games and apps.

Reviews.Title: pocket friendly price
Reviews.Author: jennifer
Reviews.Content: Bought a red one and a pink one and my kids love them great buy would buy from this seller again great gift idea and you can't beat the price

Reviews.Title: Well... You can turn it on and off
Reviews.Author: Jose Carrasquilla
Reviews.Content: Considering that my 3 year's old daughter doesn't complain when it freezes or because of it's weak built I can say It's ok. But I would not recommend it to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: bobbie
Reviews.Content: We ordered three for our girls for Christmas and overall they worked great one of the tablets camera would not work by Amazon replaced the tablet and have not had any problems. The only complaint would it would not allow me to download Subway Surfers and many other games that my daughter's were wanting on their tablets

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7" is Great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought two, one for a 5 and 6 year old and it works!!!  Keeps them off the adult tablets and they have all their age appropriate apps right at their fingertips.

Reviews.Title: NOt as good as I expected
Reviews.Author: Kimberly S.
Reviews.Content: I have ordered 2 of these tablets.  They are decent for the price but dont last long.  They stop turning on, sometimes they dont charge , and not durable at all, not even with a case! I did order the square trade warranty which i will have to use again. i will not be buying a 3rd one.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Shernise Curry
Reviews.Content: It does what I expected and allows my son to play games as well as stay off the desktop as much.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Love this unit for the price. it is all worth it fast and clear and fun.an awesome and more fun.

Reviews.Title: SEEMS TO BE OKAY
Reviews.Author: Euthemia McMahon
Reviews.Content: I just turned this on and was trying ensure that it would operate properly. It seems to work well. Does not have that many apps loaded but the ones there seem to operate also. I like the cool blue color! I purchased this for my 5yr old to read books and play educational games. I was unable to load scholastic estoria app. Hopefully I can find another reading program for children. I like that it is a little bit smaller than the normal 7in tablets. But it has the same size screen.

Reviews.Title: Great android tablet
Reviews.Author: P Augustus "peaches"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my kid. It works well and its great for beginners. I would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: My daughter likes it
Reviews.Author: Melissa Rex
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 5 year old daughter.  The batteries do not last very long, but she shouldn't be on it for more than the battery lasts anyways.  Not the best screen/clarity, but it works for a 5 year old to play games.

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEVICE
Reviews.Author: JEWELLZbennett
Reviews.Content: LOVE MY TABLET. ITS GREAT OVERALL. GOOD PRICE, GOOD FEATURES. GREAT DEVICE. I ACTUALLY BOUGHT 3 OF THESE BUT ONE IS NOT WORKING . THE SCREEN KEEPS RUNNING, GUESS ITS A MANUFACTURER DEFECT AND WHEN IT START I COULD NOT RETURN IT, ( DON'T THING THEY REPAIR THEM EITHER) BUT THEY ARE GREAT OTHERWISE

Reviews.Title: Touch Screen Dont Work
Reviews.Author: emmanuel
Reviews.Content: i manage to use it for a week until the screen went out and i really wanted it for my daughter and now she is without a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Tablet is a headache
Reviews.Author: jonathan orsini
Reviews.Content: I've had numerous problems with the tablet since I opened it from the package.the charger port doesn't work anymore it keeps shutting off by it self and erases the entire tablet back to its original state

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet!
Reviews.Author: JH
Reviews.Content: Bought this zeepad 7" tablet for my 7 yr. old granddaughter for Christmas.  I played with it and downloaded some free games and bought some music (it does come with 2 or 3 games already on it which is good).  Then I charged it up so it would be ready to go when she opened it.  She absolutely loved it.  I did find a place to set the security also.  It worked great with our wifi and does internet searches quickly.  I think it is just as good or better than the more expensive tablets.  I love that it came with a USB cable to connect to a computer and also earphones and a stylus pen.  It also plays the music purchased from iTunes that I transferred to it and my other granddaughter's more expensive kindle will not.  If you give it as a gift and you enter your google account to download anything just remember to delete the account before you give it since it downloads your emails in the gmail.  I did have a hard time finding how to delete my google account from the tablet but once I did, it deleted the 300 emails it had downloaded.  Oh and it arrived much quicker than expected.  I think this was a great purchase for the money and would like to get one for myself.

Reviews.Title: within the year it stopped working
Reviews.Author: Paige C.
Reviews.Content: We have had it less then a year and the internal battery died. This is not the battery that you can replace or charge. Waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Starter Pad
Reviews.Author: Susan Wolff
Reviews.Content: This is a great value for a first pad. Works great and it has room to grow with you. And I love the color. Its so bright and cheerful.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Ham
Reviews.Content: The 9 year old that it was given to for a birthday gift loves it n does what she needs it to.

Reviews.Title: Cheaply produced
Reviews.Author: Beth
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift...powered it on once...worked fine.  Now it will not power one any more.I do not recommend purchasing this item as you will only be contacting Amazon shortly after you receive it for a refund.

Reviews.Title: best gift award
Reviews.Author: ksolt
Reviews.Content: Great price. works well. bought 2 for christmas gifts for my grandchildren (ages 4 and 7). they have not put them down. We got the "best" gift award from them both. would suggest getting protective case.

Reviews.Title: Total junk...
Reviews.Author: Online Shopper "onlineshopper"
Reviews.Content: The description says it all.  I bought 2 of these for my granddaughters Christmas in 2012.  They didn't last till February.  Don't waste your money.  They are crap!!!

Reviews.Title: Crapola...
Reviews.Author: JK Honeycutt
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 zeepads. At first everything seemed great until I noticed the micro USB port was missing from 1 tablet. In its place was an empty hole where the port should've been installed.

Reviews.Title: Didn't last at all
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately we bought this for our 4 year old daughter to play games on and didn't want to invest a lot of money; however it only worked for about 6 months.  It was nice while it lasted but now it won't hold a charge.  Even with a new charger, it barely powers on while plugged in.  Won't turn on at all without being plugged in.

Reviews.Title: Very impressed
Reviews.Author: Tarah Peery
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tablet at the same time of another, and this one is definitely the superior product. It's thickness is a lot smaller than the other tablet, but it moves a lot quicker and smoother than the other. Easy to use, small (but not too small), and also came with a stylus and a screen protector!

Reviews.Title: Poor battery life
Reviews.Author: FabMomshopper
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 4 year old's christmas gift. Love the preloaded apps but the battery life is ridiculously short.

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: K. Smith
Reviews.Content: I knew I was taking a chance on this but optimistically thought it would be fine for an 8 y/o to play games. It was definitely not.  Excitement quickly turned to frustration as soon as she tried to use it.  It was an all-around disappointment. The screen froze constantly and it was incredibly slow both internally (it took at least 30 seconds, often longer, for most programs to even open) and when attempting to use the internet. I had high hopes, but I absolutely cannot recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Wow, well worth the money
Reviews.Author: Jose Solis
Reviews.Content: I wanted a tablet for my daughter for Christmas However, I was skeptical of the cost, and how functional it would really be.

Reviews.Title: arrived already broken :(
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: right out of the box, this didn't even work.  It didn't turn on.  I let it charge to see if it just needed to charge more first and it still didn't turn on.  I'm sad because it is so cute and a perfect size tablet.  All I saw when I hit the power button was a flash of light for a few seconds and some lines across the screen, then nothing at all.  Every time.  It would never boot up.  So disappointed :(

Reviews.Title: For the $$ it's good
Reviews.Author: amazonbuyer
Reviews.Content: Got two of these for my sons last year and they have enjoyed them. Takes a good picture, plays good apps, they have lots of music on them. Sure it doesn't load as fast as higher price tablets but for the $ it's good. Battery life may be the biggest disappointment, playing a game it will last about a hour, but recharges quickly.

Reviews.Title: Awesome considering the price
Reviews.Author: AP "matrix"
Reviews.Content: This is really a great device for the price Netflix and Wi-Fi work perfectly fine, great screen. the battery life is awesome the camera is pretty much worthless. Downloaded some educational games and books from my eight year old I couldn't ask for a better device for the price!

Reviews.Title: Fully recommended, excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: morivic perdomo
Reviews.Content: excellent product for my son, it is fast, very good picture, if we compare price and quality is an option maginifica actually buy two more.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Iwona Zrodlo
Reviews.Content: it is a good tablet for biggniners for kids becouse it is easy to operate and my kids like it

Reviews.Title: CAMERA DOESNT WORK WITH APPLICATIONS!!
Reviews.Author: Amy Kim
Reviews.Content: When we try to video using skype or oovoo, his camera doesnt work. It works fine when using it for regular pics and videos but when we try to use it for the applications, the applications dont recognize that the device has a camera! We tried every setting and option but for some reason, the camera on the device is unrecognized.Though we can still talk, this is quite annoying since the main reason why I got this for him is to be able to see him...Other than that it works fine. If anyone has any solutions to help with my problem, please help.

Reviews.Title: Unsatisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Taramatee Cindy Bhukal
Reviews.Content: I bought this item from Amazon and it arrived today.  I checked it and the camera is not working properly.  It comes on but you cannot get to take a photo.  The video icon is also sticking.  This part of the tablet is sticking and i'm wondering what it is really working.  It is slow. I am not pleased with this.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Johnson
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for my grandsons.  The produce allows them the game experience as well as watching T.V.  It is easy to use and great in the car.

Reviews.Title: Spend a little more and get a good tablet
Reviews.Author: ESTEBAN MORENO
Reviews.Content: The display broke after a few days. I don't know why. The battery didn't  last very long, like two hours.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price, recommended.
Reviews.Author: Gregory Lunar
Reviews.Content: The price appeared to me excellent, although it is not a recognized brand of tablet but is very well built, has been charged with good applications and games and dferencia other also brings the playstore and good accessories. It was received in perfect condition thanks to that it was well packaged.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: evelyn
Reviews.Content: what an awesome tablet for the money.  Does more than I expected. GREAT BUY FOR THE KIDS OR TEENAGERS OR GRAMMA.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: valerie armstrong
Reviews.Content: Great little tablet so far no complaints. Runs fast hasn't locked up once. Good quality product. Cameras take decent pics.

Reviews.Title: Cheap tablet....break easy....not worth the time and money
Reviews.Author: Alireza Torabi
Reviews.Content: I looked a relatively descent tablet...I bought it for my niece and mail it. However, the screen and monitor become blurry after 2-3 weeks....thought to return it and get a new one...but not worth the time...quality is poor...better to get a more expensive that last

Reviews.Title: Great Product for a Great Price!!!!
Reviews.Author: Erin Storey`
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sons birthday present, we wanted a tablet for him that wasn't crazy expensive but he could play games and read books, and even go onto facebook.  It is the perfect size and works great!!  The only problem I had was once trying to connect to the internet. I fixed the time zone and it connected right away. It is set up just like my Galaxay Tablet so the set up for us was real easy. Great product for a Great price!!

Reviews.Title: It's alright, few serious things though.
Reviews.Author: Michael Riddle
Reviews.Content: My tablet came with Jelly Bean 4.1.1 NOT ICS 4.0.4, and was NOT rooted. Luckily there's a program called Uberizer that can root 4.1.1 for any A13 device. The downside right now is there is a 4.2.2 update, but it's not rooting right...Overall, if you're just looking for a simple tablet for a kid to play with or something it's not to bad -- I plan to use it for my car's touchscreen/computer and am going to have to do a lot of tinkering to get it working how I was hoping.

Reviews.Title: Not the best tablet
Reviews.Author: GrammaBarbara
Reviews.Content: I am a bit disappointed with this tablet.  It is slow coming on.  The manual gives very little info and in poor English.  It is not as easy to use as I hoped it would be.  I should have read the reviews on this before investing in it.

Reviews.Title: Tablet Review
Reviews.Author: Dogrgreat
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a low cost tablet for a Friend in the Philippines and this Fit the BillIt has a good price and the product works fineI needed assistance setting up the Wifi for this Tablet, so I did a search on the Internet and there is a lot of information  for this tablet, I followed the instructions and the WiFi is workingIt has been in use,for several months and so far, so goodI feel that this tablet is very good for the price

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: Jacki Deckard
Reviews.Content: The screen doesn't work well. I have only had it a short time and used it maybe 10 times due to the fact that the screen doesn't work well at all. Sometimes it doesn't work at all. Wish I had pd more and gotten a better product.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Service
Reviews.Author: M. Rue
Reviews.Content: This is my second purchase of the same item from this company. The first time I purchased this item and few months later the back camera was not working. I contacted to company who was more than happy to assist me with an exchange. The delivery time was shorter than expected and the prices for the product you just cant beat. This ultimately resulted in my return business now purchasing another Zeepad with this company. Keep up the great customer service!!

Reviews.Title: Worth the price
Reviews.Author: Debbie Mclean-roache
Reviews.Content: This works fine for a five year old. Did not expect it to perform like a galaxy tab or something more expensive. Its worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Not so good
Reviews.Author: leorock
Reviews.Content: Cheap tablet, not durable, LCD screen got a black line across the screen after a few months of use. Recommended only for little children.

Reviews.Title: 2 out of 3 still working!
Reviews.Author: Justsilvie
Reviews.Content: Bought 3 for Christmas gift for my grandchildren. Two out of three still work, the third stopped working after 6 months. If I had bought it locally I would have tried to take it back with my receipt since my son could not find the original packing and warranty info.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Tomoe Murai
Reviews.Content: My first tablet. I just wanted to read free PDF or EPub books in the train and occasionally write/read email.For the purpose, this is great. It may be slow for internet browsing, Android is not the latest and the battery doesn't run too long, but good enough for my use. Transferring files from/to PC is really simple. The price is hard to beat.Only the con is the color (red). For some reason other colors were $10 more expensive, then, red is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy.
Reviews.Author: Shellz
Reviews.Content: Screen vision is poor.  Browser is slow. The battery run low very fast.  Don't like it at all.  Save your $70 for something better.

Reviews.Title: Nice!!
Reviews.Author: Winter Tanner
Reviews.Content: My little cousin loves it. There was no problems. It actually shipped really fast. I would totally recommend it to people who has a little child or anyone that's really young

Reviews.Title: zee tab
Reviews.Author: JERZEE2MATO
Reviews.Content: Best tablet for a kid for the price......came in less than a week....has everything a better model  tab has...

Reviews.Title: bought for a gift
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: my bf bought this for a gift for his little teen cousin. it was just ok for us because when we got it we tried it out and it was slow but great for a child or teen. she seem to enjoy it when she got her gift.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I ordered.
Reviews.Author: adam minnicks
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these for my kids' birthdays and the company said they were used but in good condition. They were brand new with nothing touched. They work perfectly for my kids aged 6 and 9. They can play their little games and go on youtube like they were doing with mommy's kindle. Now they don't have to use mommy's or fight over just having one tablet. Wifi works great, and the company sent them right on time. I'm very happy as usual with amazon. I always find a great deal on here.

Reviews.Title: Great for my 8 year old!
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: This is perfect for my daughter's 1st tablet! It came loaded with some of her favorite games and its super fast for her to download new ones.  It turned right on and connected to our wifi with no problems.

Reviews.Title: It works - Kinda
Reviews.Author: ariona_lie
Reviews.Content: Well where do I start with this thing. I read the review, but they were pretty mixed so I decided to try it myself. Now, when we first got it, we let it charge ALLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLL Night (xmas eve) My daughter was so excited, but - well it wouldnt turn on... FINALLY after another day of charging it turned on. My daughter who was 9 at the time started downloading apps - Youtube, Sugar Crush, Instagram, Angry Birds.... welllll......................skype didnt work too well, You cant see the whole game of sugarcrush - but Pandora and Youtube work just great (as long as its charged) I would next time keep my money and get a better name brand - but I guess now my 3 year old can have it...

Reviews.Title: THIS IS JUST WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR!! AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Cb
Reviews.Content: Works perfect. I am going to place 2 more orders. My friends and family will do the same. The tablet is amazing. I recommend it 100%  Thank you for my happiness!! God bless this company!!

Reviews.Title: just what I needed
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Hunter
Reviews.Content: Zeepad is for my six year old.  It is a great price. It does everything we need it to do. This is our second one even.  Perfect for his age group.  So many features.  This is good for anyone looking for a nice tablet at an affordable price. If I have any negative it would be that battery life is short.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Laura Mae Coker
Reviews.Content: These tablets are at a great price and have so many functions. My grandkids love them! And I like them too!

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: Doug Jones
Reviews.Content: We sent it back. Display was very poor. not very responsive when using it. We ended up buying a more expensive unit and are very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Its very nice and lite!
Reviews.Author: blackqueen
Reviews.Content: Am still exploring my tablet when my daughter gives me the chance to use it. But I like it very much am thinking about getting one for her so I could have mine to myself!

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: twirl6785
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my niece almost two months ago. She loves it! Durable, fast, and great for children. Great product, awesome price, and fast shipping. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Jollie Williams
Reviews.Content: Great for kids! Would recommend first before spending big dollars on IPad products.Picture quality not the best but loads apps in a snap.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed kids at Christmas :(
Reviews.Author: Mom
Reviews.Content: Do not buy from "engine29". This product had big problems right away which would have been frustrating, but ok if the seller had any concept of customer service. They ignored multiple emails, and when they did email back gave short answers that didn't solve anything. Don't waste your money. Now I'm stuck with a broken Zeepad and a disappointed 5 and 8 year old.

Reviews.Title: Great deal on purchase
Reviews.Author: simona brooks
Reviews.Content: i have receive tablet and the descripation fits my purchase as i am ready to order more of the same.Enjoying

Reviews.Title: SAVE YOUR MONEY DONT BUY
Reviews.Author: California
Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet a while ago and its a piece of junk. the processor is too slow to run games and freezes constantly. both cameras are suckish and the plastic housing feels like they bought the material at dollar tree. so buyers beware, if u want a better faster device, save up money for an ipad mini or nexus 7

Reviews.Title: BROKEN SHIPING ..
Reviews.Author: Zariyah N.
Reviews.Content: IT BROKE AS SOON AS I GOT IT I WAS SO UP SET WHEN U TRYED TO SHIP IT BACK I COULDNT REACH U GUYS TO TELL U THAT I WAS ON VACATION  .................

Reviews.Title: Save your money
Reviews.Author: Scarlet
Reviews.Content: I purchased this in January and have had problems with it since I got it. First off I couldn't get the app store to work, so added Amazons app store and got good results. Then when adding an anti-virus program to the tablet I found out that it had been used before I received it, and could not clear out that persons info. So it wasn't safe to use on sites where I wanted to purchase anything for fear someone could get my info. And because I found all this out after the 30 warranty period I was stuck with it. And now to top it off, I am unable to charge the tablet with either the plug or the cord. This product is just a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Do not purchase
Reviews.Author: Denise Clance
Reviews.Content: We purchased 4 tablets for Christmas for our grandchildren. Have been disappointed with this product of zeepad. They have had problems with pads every since we purchased them....

Reviews.Title: It works ok
Reviews.Author: Judith Christian "JCisDway"
Reviews.Content: Some apps didn't work unless I had it turned a specific way once I learned that it was smooth sailing.

Reviews.Title: dont
Reviews.Author: love tennessee
Reviews.Content: DO NOT BUY THIS IT IS A SCAM, IT WORKS FOR A FEW DAYS THEN STOPS, YOU CANT REACH ANYONE TO HELP YOU AND ITS MORE HASSLE TRYING TO RETURN IT, SO JUST BUY SOMETHING ELSE IF YOU WANT IT TO WORK, MY DAUGHTER IN LAW HATES IT WILL NOT EVER REBUY

Reviews.Title: works great except it eats up the internet bandwidth
Reviews.Author: Kathski
Reviews.Content: Bought this April 13, 2013. So far, my son loves it. Its still working great til now, its fast, and easy to use. The only complaint we have is somehow whenever my son is using this for browsing the web or watching videos, it seems to suck up all the internet bandwidth as any other device (laptop, phone, or tv) that uses our wireless internet as well tends to not be able to connect at all.

Reviews.Title: Red Zee
Reviews.Author: Paul Murry "primedwic"
Reviews.Content: Great product. My 14 year old nephew can't put it down. The color defines it as his. He loves it. Thanks

Reviews.Title: just for toddlers
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Batterys dont last much. Tablets open apart with every short fall. They are realy slow and screen does not look clear on different angles.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
Reviews.Author: Nicole Gonzales
Reviews.Content: this was the biggest waste of money. it doesnt work at all. google play doesnt work, you cant update it so the apps i have dont work, and i have emailed the seller 10 times since i got it 6 months ago, i have messaged him countless times when i could still make a return with no reply and im still contacting this seller so he can at least explain to me why it doesnt work but i doubt ill ever get a reply. im just so mad because i had tried to return it but i couldnt... very sad. :(

Reviews.Title: bad bad bad don't get we had three and they all have messed up with in 2 weeks
Reviews.Author: lisa jackson
Reviews.Content: we had three and they all have messed up with in 2 weeks I hate hate hate this product do not get

Reviews.Title: A piece of crap!!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this a month ago for my 5yr old son.Only lasted for a week.shipment was great, came a day early.The item I received didn't say any brand name it's whatever chinese writing? As what they advertise here.The tablet itself was very responsive, the volume wasn't so great, the quality of the screen pictures wasn't so great either.Plus the charger that came with it was a piece of crap, sorry for my language, I said this because it didn't FIT RIGHT to the charging port, it was sticking out.One night I charged it, the following day I was checking it, to my surprised, the metal tip that goes into the charging port  came off &was; melting.Thank God didn't burn my house.then the USB charger that they sent was too loose, my son can't even use his tablet anymore because don't have any charger to use.Went to 3stores NOBODY sell it, they said the charger I have was made CHEAP...Lesson learned, I WILL NEVER EVER PURCHASE ANY KIND OF ELECTRONICS HERE.I tried to be cheap, now I'm paying the consequences.

Reviews.Title: GOOD TABLET FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: CARLENE
Reviews.Content: BOUGHT THIS TABLET FOR MY SONS BIRTHDAY, HE LOVES IT VERY MUCH I WLD RECOMMEND IT TO ANYONE. IT CAME WITH ANGRY BIRDS AND FRUIT NINJA, SINCE THEN I DOWNLOADED ABT 5 MORE

Reviews.Title: Awesome, great customer Service, excellent product!!
Reviews.Author: D. Booth "tddbbs"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife, she uses it everyday, she is obsessed with facebook and she video skype's with her brother that lives quite a ways away, I also got the matching pink keyboard attachment and extra stylus'.  Earned me allot of points ;)  D/L apps, check your email, anything a PC can do!! Makes a GREAT GIFT!!!

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: jamie gilliam
Reviews.Content: This zeepad is a very good tablet for such a low price.  My daughter is very happy with it, she uses it all the time.

Reviews.Title: this was terrible
Reviews.Author: Raphy
Reviews.Content: the screen is crappy it broke the second day i got it and its really slow an they wont let me return it so dont get it its a waste of money

Reviews.Title: my screen was all scratched up
Reviews.Author: vanity
Reviews.Content: my screen was all scratched up it doesn't want to stay connected to wifi I have to keep making it connect

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: taysmom
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter as a cheaper alternative to an iPad or galaxy but I should have just bit the bullet and spent a few more dollars. I had to return it with in 2 months because it wouldn't charge. It took weeks to get it back and 4 months later we had the same problem. It is JUNK! plain and simple. Engine29 is not a great seller to purchase from either. They are very hard to get ahold of.

Reviews.Title: 7" Zeepad Tablet
Reviews.Author: Charlotte Branigan-Taylor
Reviews.Content: I was very satisfied with the tablet and the time that it took for me to receive it. I purchased it for my granddaughter for her birthday and I had plenty of time to download games on it for her.

Reviews.Title: Worthless
Reviews.Author: Martha McGough
Reviews.Content: I had it less than three months when the case melted while it charged.  I would not recommend it to anyone as the quality is sub par.

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEAL FOR KIDS!
Reviews.Author: Taismine Beasley "ocd mom"
Reviews.Content: I HAVE A TEN YEAR OLD WHO LOVES THIS> IT IS PERFECT FOR SOMEONE WHO DOES NOT NEED ALL THE BIGGEST BRANDS WITH THEIR BIG BRAND PRICE> T>B> CORAL SPRINGS< FLORIDA

Reviews.Title: Power Cord Required...
Reviews.Author: M. Gibson
Reviews.Content: Battery life if really poor.  You only get an hour and a half, then you need to plug in a recharge.  Very disappointing!

Reviews.Title: Great for the kids
Reviews.Author: jvi
Reviews.Content: This product is great for my kids.  It does not play all games but plays most that a 5 year old would want to play.  Everything said it is a great buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: It Crashed
Reviews.Author: Jailyn Cabrera
Reviews.Content: It crashed do to an app, it wasn't backed-up like it said. I lost EVERYTHING! But otherwise.....its pretty good. I dont like how the wifi diconnects itself though

Reviews.Title: Zee Pad 7.0
Reviews.Author: Honey Bunny
Reviews.Content: I love this product. The speed and accuracy of which it was received was unbelievable. This was the first purchase that I have made with Amazon and I dare to say that this will be one of many. Great job! Awesome product and service.

Reviews.Title: works, but barely
Reviews.Author: Mom of 2
Reviews.Content: We bought these for each of our girls for Christmas.  They can barely play any games on them.  The screens black out and processor cannot keep up.  Our 6 year old actually called it a 'fake tablet'.  It is.  We were excited to present these to them, but they were just a waste.  We have really tried to get them to work.  Battery is great on them though, but its probably because they cant really play anything!

Reviews.Title: Simply excellent for its price!

Reviews.Title: 2nd Zeepad purchase

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet for the Price (especially for a newbie)
Reviews.Author: Laura "Music Lover"
Reviews.Content: I bought this without having much expectations for my 4 year old daughter. It was only $70 and most tablets are hundreds. However, it came quickly, in the pink color I asked for. When I first plugged it in to charge (it says to charge first), I was concerned that it wasn't charging properly because the icon didn't show the charging symbol for more than a second or so. However, it did charge and I've downloaded several apps and have been using it. It's the perfect size (to me) because it isnt so big that it is cumbersome and it isn't so small t hat it is annoying. My only complaint is that it doesn't hold a charge for too long (about 2 hours). So as long as you remember to charge it, you are fine. I imagine my daughter will physically break it if I don't get a case for it, but that isn't zeepads fault. I sort of want one myself. OH.....I got the single camera. It has one camera on the side where the screen is. If you want to take pictures and actually see the thing you are taking pictures of, you may want to get the dual camera.

Reviews.Title: Good bang for the buck.
Reviews.Author: DonÂ Tuleja
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is a great little tablet. If it had more RAM it would be even better. Plays streaming HD video no trouble. Good value!

Reviews.Title: Terrible!
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Beatrice
Reviews.Content: Very Slow, not a good buy. Wish I had spent more money on a better faster tablet. This tablet should definitely be taken off the market, pronto!

Reviews.Title: Good but broke easily, if for a child then make sure you get some sort of protection
Reviews.Author: Julie Moss
Reviews.Content: My sons  broke in the first week. Worked well until then. It was a birthday present too. Its a good item, just breaks easily

Reviews.Author: Kortni Wiegreffe
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this item......had it a few days did fine, the next day it started freezing up. Then I went to put the screen protector on it that came with it. I was pressing down on the screen to get the air bubbles out and the screen cracked all the way across it. I sent back and got my full refund that I paid for tablet........ waist of time and money !

Reviews.Title: Not all that was promised was there
Reviews.Author: Broderick
Reviews.Content: Items are not bad as far as the tablets, it's not a bad tablet. I have more of a beef with the seller due to items that were promised were not in the box I received. I'm missing stylus for both of my tablets and the promised screen protectors.Seller has to do better!

Reviews.Title: Awesome tablet for the price
Reviews.Author: StanF
Reviews.Content: Excellent delivery time.  Very easy to set up to WIFI, simple to navigate & quite rapid on respond time for just the rather small RAM.  I haven't tried the cams yet tho as I very recently received it

Reviews.Title: Birthday present for 8 year old Girl
Reviews.Author: Sue-Anne Orozco
Reviews.Content: Very good gift... We purchased the Zeepad for our 8 year old daughters birthday back mid May of this year and she loves it... It's been an awesome starter tablet.. You can download just about anything from the android appstore and very easy to use... She loves it!

Reviews.Title: Nice little tablet
Reviews.Author: Chad M. "Chad"
Reviews.Content: I wanted something inexpensive for my 5 year old, he is too advanced for the normal "kid" tablets, meaning he is used to navigating android phones and other tablets.  I have only had it 2 days but so far its exactly what i need.  His last one was a bit more expensive, and even with a screen protector and a big case, he broke it.  So far this tablet is better than that one, meaning faster and able to handle movies without having to change the file type etc...and if it breaks, its 1/3 of the cost of most other tablets, plus his favorite color is red so that added to the excitement.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Zuhair Baker
Reviews.Content: For a tablet that cost about $80 it is great slow but for your kids it is what you should get them they can play watch and it has all Android stuff.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my 4 year old
Reviews.Author: Bryan "hydrophoid"
Reviews.Content: No one is going to love working on this tablet, but at the price point I hope no one is expecting to work on this tablet (you could do some work with it but you would not like it).Overall this is a great tablet for the price. My wife and I debated getting our 4 year old a LeapPad for educational games, but I was able to win out by pointing out the cost of many Android games: free.The screen has a small viewing angle and the resolution isn't the best, my daughter loves playing the ABC and puzzle games we downloaded for her. I have not purchased any software for her, but the free games on Play are awesome. This thing even runs Candy Crush (just in case you were wondering :).I wish this didn't have a proprietary charging end on it (it has a USB port, but that is not for charging) but my other tablets also have proprietary charging ports so it seems to be standard for them to make a different port.The box was full of goodies: charging cable, usb adapter (so you can plug in full sized usb items to the tablet), a stylus, AND a screen protector. They really delivered on the packaging.This tablet is really a bargain for the price, it wont win any processor speed awards and it can hang at times but if you are in the same boat and looking for something to entertain your children during long drives or you want to use some type of electronic game/learning system this is priced to be in your top 5 list of purchase considerations. On the other hand, if you are an adult looking for something to surf the web/look for jobs/ do any type of professional work with, I would suggest a different more powerful (and likely expensive) tablet.Willie-B

Reviews.Title: Great for kids
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "JT"
Reviews.Content: This is great for my grandson with downs syndrome. He broke the glass and they even repaired it for $20.00

Reviews.Title: Teenage daughter loves it.
Reviews.Author: MommaFoo
Reviews.Content: My daughter especially loves the front-facing camera and uses it to Skype with her friends.  Does the same and more as my Kindle.  She's had it a few weeks now and so far so good!

Reviews.Title: Was the quality of this item above or below your expectations
Reviews.Author: María Eusebia Díaz Guerrero
Reviews.Content: The product is brand is not offered in the notice, did not bring security, did not bring the manual or the bonus offered in the bid. All this calls into question its quality and durability.

Reviews.Title: Great Kids Tablet, Okay Quality, Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought four (yes, 4) of these for my kids for Christmas 2012. So they have been through more than six months of regular use. For $70 these are pretty good. They are definitely not iPads, Google Nexus, or Samsung Galaxies, but they are a good buy for your average 4 to 8 year olds. At this point, three of the four are still working and two of the four are working well. They work well for playing games, reading ebooks, watching movies, or taking silly (albeit low quality) pictures of oneself. They do all this just as well a Nexus.About two months ago one the tablets stopped charging, the battery still had a small charge (not enough to power up) and the charger was working. Something stopped working in the charging circuits on the motherboard. So that one is no longer usable.All but one of the chargers has stopped working, I think the wire or plug is too weak and broke, they worked if you wiggled the plug. Also the charging receptacle in the tablets is weak, one tablet's does not work anymore. And the USB port of another does not work. This has probably as much to do with the kids jamming and yanking on the cord, as anything.Fortunately, the USB connector does charge the tablet, so even without any of the chargers you can still use the tablets.The third tablet is very slow to react when tapping on the screen. This is most noticeable on the home screen, but also when playing games, though not as bad.Very odd, seems more of a software based problem than hardware.The fourth tablet, so far (knock on wood) is working fine no problems at all. Battery life has never been that great, two hours or so max. It hasn't diminished in six months so they are good quality, just not that big. Keep a smart phone charger on hand and they will last as long as you've got gas in the car.Overall, I am pleased with these tablet. Especially for younger kids, when you don't want to throw a lot of money down the drain (literally!) Trust me, I know, before they got these, my wife's Nexus, ended up in the toilet when two kids tried to grab it at the same time. Fortunately, it still works fine.We know they can take care of them now, so we will upgrade them one at a time, as they stop working. So far only one has had to be replaced. Pretty good as far as I'm concerned.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad
Reviews.Author: Sultan Khan
Reviews.Content: Its kind of cool Android tablet for kids but lacks little bit of speed. I would say you get what you pay for ...I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: this would have been a good product
Reviews.Author: Lunari Grimm
Reviews.Content: if the battery actually worked. then again i'm not even sure what i had received from PCTVSHOP was an actual zeepad considering there was no indication on the tablet or box that it was. It seemed that either there was no battery in the item or it might not have even been connected. when i sent my first request for a replacement of the faulty and questionable device i got no response from PCTVSHOP so i sent in a second and finally an A to Z claim with amazon. i then received a rude note from PCTVSHOP saying that i complained to easily and killed sellers. i finally returned it through amazon and got my money back. i gave the zeepad a 3-star because i don't know if i can honestly review it all things considered. i do give PCTVSHOP a big fat F though all around the board. don't buy from them. i'm extremely disappointed.

Reviews.Title: good for the price
Reviews.Author: nataliesmall
Reviews.Content: we bought this tablet for our 8 year old daughters birthday she had been wanting one for a while now since she got addicted to my kindle fire but we did not want to spend a lot of money for her age. We got the tablet in just a few days and came in good condition and with all the accessories. it is a little slow at time but works just fine for her connects to wi fi and really like that it has the play store so we are able to download a lot of FREE apps for her and i can also sync my kindle to her tablet and she can read the books that i have on her tablets as well. The one thing i do reccomend is getting screen protectors right away for the tablet.and the last issue that i seem to be having is after about a few weeks of having the tablet for some reason the word DEMO is now shoing on the screen in the left hand corner and i dont know how to get it off i have tried re setting the tablet in hopes that it would come off but no luck so far so if anyone has any suggestions on what i could try it would be greatly appreciated.I would definately recommend buying this for someone especially if you have a child wanting one for the first time. I know i will be planning on buying more in the near future seeing as i have 3 more daughters that are also now beeging for one!!!!

Reviews.Content: had it for about 4 months. Was slow and unresponsive at times and especially when it was nearing its end. Now it won't turn on no matter how long I wait for the screen to load, which on average took about 5 seconds after you hit the button to show the slide to unlock screen (not from startup.) In my opinion, not worth the money. Would rather have bought a 2nd generation ipod (and I hate apple products) that I know would hold up for a while. If u need something temporary to hold you and you have a lot of patience with technology, then this tablet will work for you. I had the patience but I was expecting something to last me for at least a year not 4 months.but the sellers were great. would buy from them again, just not this particular product.

And worst of all, it's stopped working within 1 month. BAD COMPANY! SCAMMER!I've bought my tablet from this company on 7 march 2013, now the have changed the picture of the tablet for you to fall in, DONT BUY IT!

I didn't give it to her yet because her birthday is still a little ways away but I have been playing with it, setting up the apps she likes moving the things she will play the most to the home screen, things like that, and its very easy to use and manuver. Its not an ipad so dont expct perfection, but if u have a tech savy kid and are tired of the old " its my turn on moms phone!" between siblings then this is for you! My only complaint is I have yet to figure out the parentel controls but close monitoring should be a close second to blocking. And I also wanna give it up to Goodios for prompt delivery and a courtesy email asking how I liked my product so far. I feel if you wanna buy this tablet, this would be the company to buy from.

Reviews.Title: 57donn

Reviews.Title: Birthday Gift

I was fearful, so I took a couple weeks to be sure all was well. The product arrived within the time allotted. Weve had no problems with a power button, or battery problem, charging, nothing. It is a great product! Especially for the price!!!! Thanks!***UPDATE almost 6 mo later** A couple months ago the product stopped charging. Ive seen others on here also complaining of problems with the charging port but figured Id figure something out or it was cheap enough to just buy my daughter a higher quality tablet in the future. What I believe to be the problem it on the charger the metal piece is wobbly. Its loose and it makes sense because ive read of others piece getting stuck within the port. Ours hasnt. I hope to get some sort of response or help because were trying to find a charger for it and I have no idea what to do. I understand this product is low cost and it is a quality product for the price but if the chargers arent working and keep being loose we cant use the product. *****

Reviews.Title: Great Buy

Reviews.Title: worst tablet ever.
Reviews.Author: Jmerc
Reviews.Content: I don't get the persons who gave these tablets high reviews because they stink.  I understand for the money you get what you pay for but man these turned out bad.  First off the power supply broke all on it's own then the port became loose and you had to hold the cord on a angle for it charge. The screens scratched easily and one even cracked. They would freeze up and you had to reset it and the battery didn't last long at all. My cell phone worked better than this product. So save yourself the trouble and don't waste both your time and money! Your better off spending some money and getting  a good brand tablet. As always "you get what you pay for!"

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Dina J Green
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a xmas gift for my grandson and according to my daughter it is awesome! Its even better than the one she at a different story and different maker for my oldest granddaughter. Now my granddaughter wants the same exact one!

Reviews.Title: Make a different purchase
Reviews.Author: meshop2
Reviews.Content: This is a purchase I regret making.  It has many issues- including disconnecting from the internet, screen freezing up, slow to respond to a command.  Sometimes it won't turn on or off.  Also the front screen is plastic.  It came scratched and since then has bubbled up in places.  Very cheap.  I guess you get what you pay for.  I would not recommend this Zeepad to anyone.

Reviews.Title: hmmm
Reviews.Author: Nicole Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: i got this for my 6yr old and well i guess i didn't pay attention to where shipped from but got it way earlier than expected so that was nice but it was from China and some of the alerts pop up in Chinese and well i don't know how to change it since didn't come with instructions and i cant read Chinese lol so that doesn't help but she really likes it otherwise :)

Reviews.Title: Like my Tablet
Reviews.Author: Timothea Bow
Reviews.Content: I bought my tablet around the holidays and I liked so much that i purchase one for my daughter and my husband. and the both like their tablets. I was a great deal it meet my needs plus. I usemy tablet for e-mail and music and reading book.ths a geat puduct for traveling. I like my zeepad.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Timothea Bow
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my daugter and she loves she uses for downloading music and for the internet, facebook,e-mail. It just right for her and what she uses it for.  She loves her tablet.

Reviews.Title: I hate it
Reviews.Author: Hilda Rosado
Reviews.Content: My daughter hates it it does not do what we expected it to do she is really disappoint with this product so am I. I would never recommend it to any one.

Reviews.Title: will not work and its old
Reviews.Author: christopher foster
Reviews.Content: I will never buy anything from these people. the screen is scratch and it broke, thanks a lot. I wont my money back

Reviews.Title: Can't beat the price, the functionality is fine.
Reviews.Author: sshjaguar
Reviews.Content: This tablet is about as cheap in price as you can find... on that same note it is a bit slow and glitchy with multi-tasking, but hey it's less than $80 so you can't expect it to compare to a $300+ Galaxy or $400+ iPad. It works great for my needs!

Reviews.Title: Save your money, get the real thing
Reviews.Author: Richard Hull
Reviews.Content: Don't  buy this knock off! All this is, is a glorified android phone (minus the calling features).I bought myself a Kindle and my GF this, it's crap. After a week of using it and only 5 applications downloaded, it runs EXTREMELY slow. Not even just the

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: shell "urs truly,chele"
Reviews.Content: I just received my zeepad everything was in perfect condition.....the seller packaged my product very good and kept me happy this is a nice tablet ..there's a lot of people saying negative things about the product even though mines came from china everything is excellent so far....

Reviews.Title: highly recommend this tablet.
Reviews.Author: tablet user
