Reviews.Content: I just got this zeepad 7 4.2 android tablet I must say it's a good tablet for surfing the web,facebook,YouTube,and great for gaming I would recommend this tablet to anyone oh yeah a great e-reader too!!

Reviews.Title: just bought a new one
Reviews.Author: Steve fox jr
Reviews.Content: I did like this tablet but it broke so I sent it back to China after 2yr wait and I heard nothing but keep checking in to Amazon I just bought a new one

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money!
Reviews.Author: VALERYE BLAIR
Reviews.Content: Two of the buttons broke within the first week.  It wasn't being used by toddlers, it was being used by 12 and 13 year olds, so I didn't expect it to break.

Reviews.Title: do not buy!!!
Reviews.Author: jesse sheets
Reviews.Content: Bought 2 and both broke within a month.. One was broken when we received it, the screen would move on its own. The second one quit charging. Definitely not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Delivery time and Awesome Product for the Price!!!
Reviews.Author: chris prater
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tablet for my son's bday on a Monday night and recieved it on Thursday morning, which was awesome! I opened it to try it out myself and the response time on the touchscreen is great!, it came loaded with a few games and Google play store, which is what I was looking for as my son loves dling apps and games! I think for the money, it was an awesome, capital AWESOME buy!Quality is good, it came packaged with everything included (earphones, chords, stylus even!) I am extremely satisfied (: and to whomever is looking for a tablet, look no further!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal for tablet!
Reviews.Author: AshleyMarie065
Reviews.Content: My daughter begged for a tablet for her 5th birthday- I told her if she saved the money. She saved a little over $80, so she didn't have much choice than buying a "cheaper" tablet, and ended up with a hot pink zeepad. This was PERFECT for her! So perfect, my 3 year old ended up with one for birthday just a month later. Now, being 8 months later, I ended up buying one for myself so I can stop stealing theirs. Granted, they use theirs for children games and learning games, including ones that have taught them to read. Mine is used for the Kindle app for the most part, since the screen is bigger than my phone, but I also use it for many other things, including Facebook, Twitter, etc. It's great! My 5 year olds is the only one I had an issue with, and thats because she kept dropping it- then I bought us all cases. And the only thing wrong with hers is the volume button stopped working. I think it's well worth the money, great for any age!

Reviews.Title: Yeah zeepad
Reviews.Author: NikiG
Reviews.Content: It was great but I sent it back to get the upgrade (dual camera). I bought it with the hope that it will be able to play Startfall (a learning site for kids) but you have to pay for all the apps whereas the website is free. I have not yet discovered how th find and use the office programmes (word, excel etc).

Reviews.Title: Beginners tablet
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Cool tablet 4 price. Really good for you if you're beginning to use a tablet. the price is cheap so you get what you pay for, of course is not an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Great for Price- Brought for a 5years old
Reviews.Author: Shall
Reviews.Content: Brought as as Christmas gift, so I had not used it yet. But others that I know gives it high praises.Lady Cancer-Texas

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: bsassy406
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my 5 year old's birthday. He wanted an iPad but I found this to be much more reasonable and offer the same type of apps. It is a little more complicated for him to navigate through, but he catches on so fast he will have it down in no time. You do need a memory card for it. Which is something I am not used to having since we are typically an Apple family. The battery isn't an issue for us since we use it in the car and there is a car charger, and he can plug it up at home.

Reviews.Title: I have a problem!
Reviews.Author: Reginald Anding
Reviews.Content: You just sent two tablets and pink! you did not send the keypads!! and you sent a paper saying due to inventory allocation you are providing me with a free upgrade of dual camera tablet for my purchase of single tablet camera! where is the single tablet and keyboard I hope! please tell me what is wrong!  Reginald Anding

Reviews.Title: Damaged camera and USB port does not work
Reviews.Author: Ping
Reviews.Content: I received the tablet with enthusiasm. It worked fine until I realize that the camera shows static. There is not even a glimpse of image. I have never been able to use it. Also i tried to connect my flashdrive and other USB devices to it but they do not show up. I contacted the seller but I am yet to receive a response. I am not pleased with my purchase and the poor customer service.

Reviews.Title: Ahhhhhhhhh!
Reviews.Author: Ran
Reviews.Content: The tablet has not broken down.. YET!  I'm waiting for it (It's my 6 year old's tablet).  My problem with the tablet is everything that came with it was garbage and timed for self destruction.  The stylus lasted 1 literal day the connector lasted 2 literal days; haven't used the usb adapter so its still around.. The screen protector latest about 1 week.. Again i'm waiting for the tablet to go if it was also built to this quality.The stylus point pushed in; The connector was brittle and the prongs broke into the case... 2 Stars..As far as the tablet its self it is working pretty well; expected speed, response and cam image quality...

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Tester
Reviews.Content: Do not buy if children under 7 years of age it lasted us about 6months. Bought two, and both screen cracked.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Present
Reviews.Author: Regina Gamble
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday day present for my daughter it does not have flash camera like it was noted false advertisement also it looked used I should of taken it out of the box before I gave it to her and  she did not receive the earphones and something else it was suppose to come with it.  I ordered this  back in April because it was cheap.  Now I see Zeepad has taken the part out about flash camera and reduced the price.  I would not recommended this to someone over the age of 5.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for Kids
Reviews.Author: K. Lucas
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these to save my Kindle from my 5 year old twins.  They love them so much, I now have to pry the zeepads out of their hands to get them to come to dinner.  This is NOT the same calibre tablet as the Kindle Fire HD or the iPad, or Samsung!  The screen is not HD, the touch sensors are sluggish, the processor is not fast and the battery life is relatively short.  That said, it works perfectly in the twin's small hands and gives them access to games and a camera AND it has the capacity for more memory.  I am happy give them this much power for less than $100.  I'm not sure how long they will last, but so far I don't regret my purchase at all.  Over all, I am happy with them.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: crazymama7
Reviews.Content: This item is horrible..from day one I had serious problems with it, it will not hold a charge, it freezes up constantly,shuts off by itself, it is very slow!!! It is the worst tablet you can purchase!

Reviews.Title: Not a good tablet.
Reviews.Author: Mildred P. Gomez
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Zeepad for my daughter in January.  For some reason the color of the screens is turning green.  It started off with some parts of the pictures were not the right color but now almost the whole screen has the wrong color. I made sure that the color setting was correct. The seller would not exchange it for us.  after only owning it for less than 4 months my daughter is not able to use her tablet.

Reviews.Title: cheap
Reviews.Author: Katherine M. Lovsey "KML"
Reviews.Content: got this to go with a tablet for my niece. she doesn't use it because it only works half the time.

Reviews.Title: beyond awesome
Reviews.Author: effy
Reviews.Content: I luv this tablet. I was worried how well it would work and if I had to buy a bigger memory card right away but the amount of memory it comes with is plenty for all the apps and games I want to play. It works really good and I luv the fact that my tablets pink and the same size as those ipad minis for wayyyyyy less money. The tablet got shipped to me sooner than the expected date too. All in all I'm searching these guys for all my electronics purchases from now on. Great job you guys. Excellent customer service.

Reviews.Title: WARNING PIECE OF CRAP DON'T BUY
Reviews.Author: Jamie S. Mustard "~J-ME~"
Reviews.Content: Bought 3 of these in Feb and 1 month later only one of them still works.  There is no rest button on them and they won't hold a charge.  I want my money back but I know I will never get it.  When looking it up online since there is no brand name (and ZeePad is not a brand name) you can't find any info on the piece of S***.  Not only am I pissed about this but you have screwed my kids over.  Thanks for nothing.

Reviews.Title: great for the price
Reviews.Author: mandie
Reviews.Content: The zeepad work as well as my Ipad really good deal for the price. Only thing I don't like is that you cant see the screen from a angle. Its best for front head one viewing. camera was ok and its small enough it slides easily into my purse. my 3 young kids now want one sense they can afford one verses the apple alternative at 400$ over all I would buy this item over again and will for my kids .

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: This gel cover is really nice and goes well with the 7 inch tablet I bought for my step daughter.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Kimler
Reviews.Content: It works like as well as a Ipad with out the cost.  I got me and my sister one and we love them.  Great for travel.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet - Headphones sucked
Reviews.Author: hansueter
Reviews.Content: My 16 month old son is always taking my phone to play on.  I needed something he could play with and I not have to worry about him wrecking it and me being out a lot of money.  This is perfect.  He's dropped it several times, and still no issue.  The back did pop off one time when he dropped it, and it just popped right back on.  It also works for what I need too.  I've used it several times now to do work on.  Obviously there is not much memory so you'll need an extra micro SD, but for the price, I'll take it...I did how ever have an issue with the ear buds that came with it.  There was a nasty dirty finger print on the ear piece.  They weren't the best quality ear buds anyways, but I definitely wasn't using them after that.  I contacted the seller, and they sent me a new set of earbuds in a different brand.  Small issue, but still 100% happy with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Do I have to give it a star???
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Duckett
Reviews.Content: I bought these for my two daughters for Christmas. One was dropped on Christmas day and has been in a computer repair shop since, he says it is junk.  This I realize, could be due to it being dropped. However the other zeepad I purchased stopped working in late January! It had never been dropped! I know the cost to purchase these tablets was extremely inexpensive, however I would expect them to work for longer than one month. I am highly disappointed in this product!

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware-Horrible piece of junk!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jokergeorge
Reviews.Content: This thing was good for a few days+then it was over.We bought it for our daughter,who handled it with great care,+within days she said the volume didn't work.Then it wouldn't connect to wifi.Then it would frequently freeze up+she can't rectrieve her video+pictures she took of her schoolmates now.The manual is written in broken english+the Square Trade warranty we bought for this(Amazon recommended it)is useless.They just passed the buck right back to the Zeepad manufacturer-which is nearly impossible to get a phone number,or e-mail to contact them- and to Amazon,which hasn't done anything yet.This is a joke all the way around+a complete waste of money,never mind our daughter being heart broken after she waited so long to get a tablet of her own.Don't buy this garbage+skip the "recommended" Square Trade warranty!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet!
Reviews.Author: L. Smith "grammasmitty"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a grandchild. Played with it for a full day, setting it up with Wifi and several apps. It is just a little slower than my Galaxy, but other than that is just a great tablet. Priced well for a child. Connects to internet, display is good. Takes pictures with front camera, wish there was a back camera. Storage is small (4 gb) but can be expanded with a 32 gb mini sd card. Very pleased with this product!

Reviews.Content: Screen is too slim while time you touch screen with a small pressure and you can see a black spot by your finger ...Battery is holding for 25 min ... It means its usseless .....To slow  TouCh screen most games doesn't feel a touch screenBorough this tablet for my wife only because review said is great tablet -IT'S NOT

Reviews.Title: don't buy this
Reviews.Author: Anna Seeger "the goodbee girl"
Reviews.Content: The tablet came with a cracked screen.  Sent it back right after Christmas. Waiting to hear from vender that he received it.

Reviews.Title: fabulous tablet
Reviews.Author: Charmaine White "CWhite"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my 7 yrs grandson. He loves this tablet. This tablet is a good purchase for people who are not tech savvy.  However, sometimes it freezes, but, all you have to do is turn off the tablet and turn back on. Netflix works perfect on this tablet. My grandson downloads lots of games. FYI you might want to invest in a micro SD card for more memory. other than that, this is a fabulous tablet.

Reviews.Title: The Zeepad
Reviews.Author: PurpleDiva
Reviews.Content: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this THREE times, because I went out on a limb and actually bought 3 at one time for my kids at christmas; 8, 9 and 10 years old. I bought one in white, pink and black.  They are able to work them, I have found security apps to monitor the ones they download. They are just perfect- now the kids stay off of my phone and my Ipad!

Reviews.Title: ok tablet Bad company to deal with
Reviews.Author: Dianne
Reviews.Content: Got this for a present for my grandaughter for christmas.It came really fast .She opened it and started playing it .and she loves it.Update had a problem with tablet got ahold of engine 29 they said return it and they would fix it I did that They claimed they never got it back. I proved they did....Them they call me and tell me to send $10:00 to retuun it So  I do then they say they never got money order Now have proof it was cashed on April 16th. Still wont send Tablet back and will not answer my calls or emails!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Real Nice
Reviews.Author: Randy Landry
Reviews.Content: One of the best tablets out right now They Love Them Will Bye Another one if the price go back down

Reviews.Title: It's good for a kid - you get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: JC in the DubC
Reviews.Content: Although the expedited shipping through the USPS was a few days behind schedule (better late than never) - I wont hold that against the manufacturer.The tablet itself is light-weight, easy to use, and meets my expectations for an Android OS. Although it took some tinkering in the settings, eventually I got it to unfreeze enough to download apps. (Instructions indicated doing something, but the print is so small and pictures even smaller that even with 20/20 vision I couldnt figure out what it said). The touch pad isn't always all that responsive...but for the most part, it's good enough for a 12 year old. I wasn't using the stylus that comes with it at the time..but perhaps the response from the touch screen would have been slightly better if it had.Ran into some issues of it 'not responding' and not accepting my request to shut the system off to try and fix the problem - eventually I did get it to come out of it's funk and it worked just fine. But it does freeze a bit. Runs a little slow, but with only 512MB of Ram, I chalk that up to the fact it's been a while since I've worked with something with such a slow processing speed.It's a decent reader - the kid prefers the weight and size compared to that massive Nook she got from another relative for Christmas. The fact that it is PINK is possibly the biggest plus. It does run most Google Play apps - so that is a plus since they are mostly free.  The front facing camera is pretty poor quality, so that feature for Skype is there, but know it's about as good as webcams from 10 years ago. If you're kids aren't very patient - might not be for them as it does seem to freeze if you're scrolling through the screens...but I like it over all and would even buy myself one for the reader alone.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: HappyMom
Reviews.Content: Product arrived today. Was a little worried about that. Well packaged and intact. I cant complain.  Tracking was easy and updated regularly. Its super cute bubble gum pink perfect for a little girl. Great for the price.  I messed around with it today and it works fine. Lets hope it stays that way. Only issue is I thought it was being shipped from MI and it came from CA. Had me worried about delivery dates. All in all satisfied. Happy holiday in my home.

Reviews.Title: i hate it
Reviews.Author: chevette
Reviews.Content: the product was received weeks late and wen the gift finally arrived the screne was broken and the tablet had scratches

Reviews.Content: I am trying to either get it replaced or return it bcuz the screen is not completely attached and the mic hole isn't big enough to put in ear phones head phones or even a small speaker .

Reviews.Content: el paquete esta en buen estado solo en la espera para probar los productos, segun lo que indica la marcae un buen producto

Reviews.Content: The charger that I received is apparently not correct one? when it is plugged into the tablet, it doesn't set flush to the tablet. Therefore, I have not been able to even turn on the tablet. I'm disappointed and cant even use it.  I see the little android symbol but doesn't respond to touch or buttons at all. Instructions written in English but make no sense.

Reviews.Title: JUST A TOY
Reviews.Author: M. Brooks Michel
Reviews.Content: I NEVER USE IT. IT DOES A FEW THINGS A COMPUTER DOES, BUT NOT AS WELL. MOST OF THE TIME IT SAYS" PLEASE WAIT"

Reviews.Title: Wow!!
Reviews.Author: jnrpetty79
Reviews.Content: We ordered this product for my daughters birthday. We were attracted by the price and thought if she breaks it, no big deal. We received the tablet and we charged it and downloaded some games so she could start playing right away. She was so excited. But she only got to play with it for ten minutes before she had to go to church. Upon returning home, the tablet wouldn't power on at all or show any signs of life. The back of the tablet was hot. Needless to say we are getting our money back and going with a Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: zeepad
Reviews.Author: mel
Reviews.Content: this was bought as a gift for my niece and  nephew they loved it .The product met my expectations and I am more than happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: zee tablet

Reviews.Content: We gave this to our 8 yr. old grand daughter for her 8th birthday. She loves it  and has been able to download many free games. It is very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: new zee-pad

Reviews.Content: the item was not what it was advertised as i can not get on you tube,or online movies i was sadly disappointed

I emailed the company to return it and they refused to take to back. I wouldnt recommend this product or the company it was purchased through.

Reviews.Title: MY REVIEW OF ZEEPAD 7.0
Reviews.Author: albert
Reviews.Content: LOW VOLUME NEED HEADPHONES TO HEAR THE SOUND. WHAT CAN I DO ?  HELP! OTHER THEN THAT IT'S OK.SEND ME A E-MAIL ON WHAT I CAN DO.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Scathey
Reviews.Content: When I  first received these items, they worked pretty good and then after about 2 weeks one of them quit working completely.. I bought these for my younger girls but just decided to send them back and get something else..u get what u pay for! I do have to say the shipping was great.. They got here in two days!

Reviews.Title: Very nice little tablet
Reviews.Author: jorge a. rivas
Reviews.Content: I bought 3 of these tablets, for my three boy and they love these tablets, don't have trouble connecting to the internet or using them, the camera is not an excellent camera that can take pictures of a 5 mp camera, so don't be thinking you can use the camera to take quality pictures  But a lot of more expensive tablets out there have the same quality cameras. they are well build my youngest boy has drop his a few times and still working good. for the price this was a good deal and yes I will recommend it to any body.

Reviews.Title: Cheap junk
Reviews.Author: Fred Friendly
Reviews.Content: I purchased 4 of these and after using them for a couple of months I can honestly say they are absolute crap.Pros:Has Google Play and plays YouTube.Andriod seems to be stable and we have had few crashes.Performance is reasonable for a sub $100 tablet.Wifi seems to be stable and does not drop out but signal receptions is relatively weak.Cons:The screen is very easily scratched.  The manufacturer apparently knew this and included a screen protector.  However, the protector is of very low quality and peels off and/or develops air bubbles after a few days.One of the units had some problems with the internals and if you put your finger on back it in a specific spot it would create a distortion pattern on the screen in the front.One unit was DOA.  The touch screen had a dead spot (which happened to line up with the "S" key on the onscreen keyboard making it unusable.  In general, the touch screens are of low quality.  All of them have manufacturing defects like embedded dust particles in the plastic (that become evident after installing the screen protector)  indicating they were produced in a low quality facility.The power button on one of the units has already failed and no longer powers on or off the unit.The screen is a critical feature of a tablet and this one fails miserably on all counts.  It is cheap Chinese crap and should be avoided.I got frustrated and purchased a Nextbook in Walmart for the same price as one of these units and the difference in quality is astounding.  The Nextbook is light years ahead of the Zeepad.

Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Operation is inconsistent.  Freezes up too much. USB port appears to only be for charging. Touch screen response is inconsistent. Internet access is only by WIFI.  Doesn't appear to be upgradeable (hardware, ram). Cool idea for a beginning tablet/device for a preteen or displaying video work. The price is attractive but don't look to be too impressed once you receive it. Instruction booklet was poorly put together.  My ten year old daughter has better composition.  Packaging, presentation and operation make it reminiscent of a "knockoff" or "bootleg". I guess you buy cheap, you get cheap!

Reviews.Title: SO ANGRY
Reviews.Author: Eileen Traynor
Reviews.Content: I ORDERED FOUR ZEEPADS FOR MY FOUR CHILDREN! WELL ON THE INFROMATION BY THE SELLER IT SAYS SKYPE ON IT WHICH DOESNT WORK.! I WAS SUP. TO RECIEVE IT ON THE 21ST OF DECEMBER, I NEVER RECIEVED THEM ON THAT DATE AND WROTE TO THE SELLER. THEY DIDNT EVEN HAVE THR CURTOUSY TO LET ME KNOW IT WASNT GOING TO COME UNTIL THE 24TH. THEN ONE OF THEM DOESNT WORK AT ALL IT FREEZES EVERY TWO SECONDS, AND WROTE ONCE AGAIN TO SELLER AND NO REPLY, NOW MY SON HAS TO NOT HAVE ONE OF HIS CHRISTMAS PRESENTS BECAUSE I HAVE TO RETURN IT AND GET ANOTHER ONE AND PRAY THAT THIS NEW ONE I AM SENT WORKS. THIS WAS SUPOSED TO BE A NEW ITEM, AND IN NO WAY DOES IT LOOK NEW IT LOOKS USED. THIS SELLER IS NOT PROFESSIONAL AND DOES NOT CARE IF THE CUSTOMERS ARE SATISFIED. WHEN YOU LOOK AT THE PRODUCT FROM THEM IT SAYS CERTAIN THINGS LIKE SKYPE BUT IT DOESNT DO THE SKYPE VIDEO OR IT JUST FREEZES. SO NOW I AM WONDERING HOW LONG WILL IT TAKE FOR MY 9YEAR OLD TO GET ANOTHER ONE FROM THE SELLER WHEN IT IS RETURNED. UGH NOT HAPPY AT ALL! HOPEFULLY THEY WILL GET BETTER CUTOMER SERVICE AND SEND A NEW ONE ASAP I WILL BE SENDING IT OUT ON 01/02 LETS HOPE THIS PROCESS IS FAST AND WE ACTUALLY RECEIVE A WORKING ZEEPAD AND MAYBE THE PROGRAMS THAT ARE PROMISED AS WELL. I WOULD NEVER RECOMMEND THIS SELLER

Reviews.Title: disappointed !
Reviews.Author: dbrunetti
Reviews.Content: purchased two , one seems to be working fine but the other not so much....screen freezes constantly and not responsive to touch. theres nothing worse than giving a child something christmas morning and have it work so poorly...trying to contact seller and exchange , i will give them the benefit of the doubt that this one was a fluke , but as of day one not happy at all !!

Reviews.Title: Very Dissatisfied!!

Reviews.Content: I wish I could give no star at all. I returned this piece-of-crap after 2 hours of use. Viewing angle is poor, headphone jack didn't even accommodate the cheap earbuds that comes with it. Sound is barely audible and lastly, I'm getting the run-around about my refund. DO NOT waste your time purchasing this crap.

Reviews.Title: Love It!!
Reviews.Author: DuneMommy
Reviews.Content: My daughter saved her money and bought this tablet for herself...We LOVE it!! It is pretty fast and works great for what she wants. I'm hoping my husband gets me one for Christmas

Reviews.Title: Piece of crap
Reviews.Author: Jason Berry
Reviews.Content: Save your money. this thing is cheap and worthless. its super slow. quality is terrible, stuff dont work on it. super confusing, if you are a first time tablet owner dont buy this. would not recommend to anyone

Reviews.Title: Take care of it.
Reviews.Author: Marina
Reviews.Content: My mom bought this tablet for my super spoiled little sister. And yeah, its a kid tablet. I thought it would be more durable.But my seven year old sister dropped it. And the screen cracked. Only a white screen. It went blank. So I recommend anyone buying this to invest in a case. And now she wants to take my laptop and possibly destroy it.She's a destroyer!

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Yessenia
Reviews.Content: I have not recived it yet and its been over a month it going to be 2 months almost since I placed my order and have not recived it.

Reviews.Title: 4 gb
Reviews.Author: Susan P.
Reviews.Content: Gift for my grandson. I'm sure he'll love it. Yes, I know this review is not helpful... I'm just the grandma.

Reviews.Title: extremly poor quality. Not enough GB to connect to the internet. Be prepared to upgrade or spend money on another product.
Reviews.Author: Nichole Flores
Reviews.Content: Exremly poor quality. Not enough GB to connect to the internet. Be prepared to upgrade or spend money on another product.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed Customer
Reviews.Author: Phil
Reviews.Content: Huge issue with the google play store and the connection. Never been able to install my apps on that. Plus it is not 4GB like the description says but rather 1.70GB. I am disappointed. It is cheap made (the outer box) and a single drop of rain on the screen would make the display shake like it's got a virus. Battery dies quick  when videos are played. The book reader can hurt your eyes, the resolution is not the best. The only good side is the audio music part and folders and pictures.

Reviews.Title: All we expected and more
Reviews.Author: LadyAylan
Reviews.Content: After reading a ton of product reviews, I ran across this listing.  At the time it only had 26 reviews total.  But even the negative reviews were helpful.  This being said, I am an owner of a Galaxy Epic cell phone, and know what the "average" tablet can do (all my cell does, just a bit bigger).  This tablet could and does compete with the Galaxy.  I admit there are a few things the Galaxy has as features this tablet doesnt do, but for the most part it can do all you need (unless you are a high end user).  This tab comes with just under 1gb memory onboard.  I do recommend you buy an 8gb micro SD card (TF card) to go with when ordering as most aps want to install to the card.  Set up was easy and second nature~ no having to flash the bios, or other such nonsense that many other no-name tablets had on their reviews to get Google Play (market).  We purchased 2 with "Christmas Money" and we are discussing saving up for 2 to 5 more (we are a family of 7).  They are reasonably priced, and well made, and fit our families needs.****UPDATED**** Battery expanded and after 9 mo no longer works.  The battery broke open the Tablet.  I am disappointed.  The child who this tablet belonged to, was not hard on the item, and it had been on the shelf for a couple weeks when we went back to get it, it had broke.

Reviews.Title: Waste of Money
Reviews.Author: Stacie Collins
Reviews.Content: Daughter dropped one time and it broke. Waste of money. Next time i will go with the little bit more expensive one!

Reviews.Title: fantastic & affordable!
Reviews.Author: A.S.
Reviews.Content: Just received this in the mail, it came in a very timely fashion.  We chose to buy this for our ten year old boy instead of an ipod touch for many reasons.  First, he wanted it solely for the purpose of playing games, as he already has an ipod nano.  He has asked for the ipod touch for Christmas, but I hope he is pleasantly surprised as we are!  Secondly - affordability!  My teenage son and I already went onto the playstore and downloaded apps, and I looked in his backpack for the books he is reading and downloaded them so he can read them anywhere! I am certain he will love the netflix and the angry birds along with the other games it comes with.  Bought an extra micro SD card, have set it up wifi in our house.  Love it love it.  Works well so far, hopefully it will continue with regular use!  Thank you for the previous reviews I read which helped me feel confident in this purchase.  The one in particular I agreed with - you can't compare this to the ipad - it's just a perfect mini ipad for games, movies and fun.

Reviews.Title: Zeepad 7.0
Reviews.Author: Brittany Clay
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for my boys. What a waste of money. The speakers barely work. I hate this item.

Reviews.Title: zeepad has not yet come

Reviews.Content: I am currently deployed to Afghanistan and my wife ordered 2 of these for x-mas and have yet to be seen. This is complete BS !!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Novak
Reviews.Content: Ive finally receive my tablet, it came earlier than expected...Give me A Hr to critique the product for my next review thanks.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't really work all that well
Reviews.Author: J. W. Horton
Reviews.Content: We bought this to be able to skype or oovoo with our granddaughter. The wi-fi does not connect well to the internet and there is a lot of noise on the line. The camera does not work. She could see us and hear us but we could only hear her. There are no directions included and no customer service line. We should have realized this was a bad buy when it was going to take 30 days to ship from China. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!
